"I may not be a match for your sister, but I can take it out on YOU!" she screeched. The two of them covered their ears as the blast of sonic waves nearly knocked them over. When it faded, Matt looked down to see the woman pokemon shaking fearfully, looking like she was going to run away again. she looked up and met his gaze, and he was lost in her endless eyes.

Matt's arms went up and he centered himself in front of her. The Onix woman hesitated, then laughed, "I don't want to hurt you human, so step aside so I may take my revenge out on that Flareon girl for what her sister did to me!" she seethed, pointing a shaking hand at the girl. Matt tried to stand up straighter, "What could she have done that was so bad? Was this girl even a part of what happened?" he wasnt' sure why he was standing up to a 28-foot long stone snake woman, but Matt knew he had to protect this Flareon girl.

"She humiliated me! That bitch will regret doing such things to me!!!" she moved forward. Matt stood his ground, not sure what to do. Her human half alone was 7 feet tall, she could just toss him aside and have her way with the girl. But then, an odd thought crossed his mind, and he said it as a question.

"What do you think her sister would do to you if she found out?" He had no idea why he said it, he just did, and he prayed it would at least slow her down.

Matt didn't know how scary the Flareon girl's sister was, but he went with it. "Yeah, if what she did was so humiliating, think of what she'd do to you if you attacked her sister!" It may have been a bluff, but it was a bluff with bite.

Looking down, her feet nearly took up the whole width of the street, leaving only a small gap in between that she realized a car was wedged between, it having tried to drive through the gap, only to get wedged between. Carefully, she lifted up a single foot, and gently pushed the car away, before putting her feet back down. This display of power reminded her just how much damage she could cause, and how gigantic she now found herself to be...and growing even larger, she noted, as she shuddered and promptly became 150 feet tall.

"Matt, we...should probably go somewhere else." Rose said gently, looking down towards the growing crowd near her feet. She could hear the ever-growing murmurs of the crowd, as they all admired her, either in shock, awe, or possibly arousal, she realized. "It's a little crowded here...we may need to go some place a little more...private." she said, ignoring the sounds of disappointment coming from the crowd. Looking out towards the gathering she created, Matt agreed. "You're right, but I may need to bring some things with me, just in-case. Is there anything you need?" he asked, not even considering the fact that there wasn't much she could possibly use, anymore. "Some new clothes, maybe." she joked. "I'll tell you if I find any. But I'm going to go pack up the essentials, and then we'll be able to go." Nodding, the Sylveon watched as her incredibly tiny friend (who she thinks is about to become her lover) heads inside the nearly dollhouse-sized apartment building, and she waits.

While she waited, she continued to look around, taking in the sights. Aside from all the pokegirls admiring her (which she realized wasn't just in her immediate area; she was probably creating a nice view throughout much of the city), the size of the buildings is what really hammered in her new size. They didn't even compare! The tallest buildings only came up to her upper torso, but she still towered above them, making them look like toys in comparison. But in reality, they were not toys, and they were full of even more people staring at her, which she realized she didn't mind. She knew that the attention would come with the size, so she just shrugged it off, taking it as a compliment more than anything. After all, who wouldn't want to be admired for being the tallest, sexiest thing for miles around?

Finally, Matt walked back out onto the balcony, this time wearing a rather bulky backpack. "What's it for? Going to explore Rose Mountain, Matt?" she said with a grin. "Soon enough, Rose, but I just packed the essentials. Sleeping bag, spare clothes, food... condoms..." he muttered, trailing off. Then, two things occurred to Matt: 1. The situation was so absurd that being embarrassed over packing condoms was incredibly silly in hindsight, and 2. Did he even need them? How would that sort-of thing work with a Sylveon 23 times his size, and still growing? But he just shrugged those thoughts off.

There was a few moments of silence, and the crowd below even seemed to go silent in response, waiting for something to break the ice. Rose finally asked "Do...do you care if I pick you up, Matt?"

Matt actually hadn't thought about that, but after a second or so of thought, said "Of course not! I know you'd never hurt me, and who wouldn't want to be held by someone as big as cute as you?" he said confidently, causing Rose's smile to grow ever wider. Rose adjusted into a kneeling position, being extra careful not to crush anybody beneath her (and the crowd seemed to back off in reaction, anyway) she reached out a furred hand, settling it at the edge of the balcony for Matt to step on.

Looking up at her for a moment, and looking over the rail of the balcony, he climbed over the bars and landed with a soft impact on her palm, as his mind was once again reminded of the sheer size difference between them. As exciting as it was, it was also somewhat worrisome. But mostly exciting, he concluded, and with that, Rose began to walk (more like stride) down the street, creating minor quakes and craters as she did so. Looking up towards his gigantic girlfriend (a term he felt he might as well use to describe her, now) he watched her as she walked slowly and cautiously, careful not to hurt anybody as she walked down the street, weaving between buildings. Although everybody seemed to avoid her, so that was barely an issue.

After relaxing in her furred palm for a few minutes, Matt finally spoke up. "Where are we going, Rose?" Having heard this, Rose looks back down at him with a smile, and replies...

114122112.content:
Slowly, Matt was coming to a few realizations. The first was he really, really wanted to have fun with the gigantic Rose in a way he had been putting off for far too many years now. He could have 'done it' with dozens of more than eager female Pokemorphs by now. Not that he was exactly the best looking man around, more like he was one of only very few men around at all and male Pokemorphs were unheard of. Yet he hadn't, all for Rose, yet he couldn't bring up the nerve to do what was in his rights to do. Always putting it off to 'someday'.

Which brought Matt to his other realization. If her growth continued, possibly indefinitely...his time to actually man up and have sex with Rose was limited. So it was decided: he would do it, and live with the consequences whatever they may be. If she was going to lose her innocence, she probably would have lost it by now with all the violence and sex in the movies and TV shows they've watched together. And if she hated him for making his move on her, he would accept that. If she wanted to squash him like a bug, then he would accept that too.

First things first, however. He needed to pack up what few possessions he needed and prepare to leave. While looking down from the balcony, he could see that the landlady Nidoqueen was busy ogling Rose outside...along with a small but growing crowd of Pokemorphs. "Oh my... I-I've never drawn a crowd before..." Rose commented as she followed your gaze to around her feet and stood back up to her current jaw dropping height. If Matt were on the ground with them, he wouldn't even come up to her ankle.

"Don't be scared, Rose. I'll pack up and then we can head out of here. Er, once we settle things with Nadira about the...damages to her building." Matt replied and then went inside.

Rose noted that she actually wasn't scared of the crowd she was drawing. In fact...a part of her enjoyed the attention. As she waited for Matt, she thought about how she just yesterday had been a diminutive, rather plain Pokemorph of 4'2". And only with her long ears up! Now, she was like a gigantic, walking symbol of sexiness. But the power that came with her size meant she needed to be extremely careful with her surroundings so that they remained intact and she didn't accidentally hurt anyone. Her hand found itself encircling her pussy as she thought, though she blushed and pulled it away as soon as she realized what she was doing to the apparent disappointment of the crowd.

Matt finished packing, and was about to go ask Rose to pick up Nadira so they could talk, (he dared not go down to that crowd of desperate Pokemorphs at her feet) when he noticed the bedroom clock. The second hand wasn't moving, yet he swore he put in fresh batteries just a few days ago when Rose had mentioned it. Odd... He went out to the balcony just in time to see her almost masturbate. "Rose! Could you bring the landlady up here please?" he asked, pretending he didn't see her do that.

"Hm, I don't think that will be necessary. At least, not just yet." a mysterious voice replied with a hint of amusement, causing both Matt and Rose to look around for its source.

Suddenly, Rose lurched forward and scooped Matt up from the balcony, a look of combined worry and terror on her face. "I...I can't control my body..." she muttered with fright.

"Of course not, Rose of Sharon. Oh, I'm sorry, you prefer just Rose don't you?" the voice laughed, though not in a malevolent manner as its owner clarified, "I'm in control of it. And what a body it is that you've fashioned for yourself if I might add!"

It's of no surprise to either of them that this voice sounded as though it belonged to a female. However, Rose was genuinely puzzled as to how this voice knew her name and could control her every movement like a puppet on a string. "S-show yourself, whoever you are!" she demanded, trying to sound brave despite her terror. Matt was beginning to suspect just who the voice was...

There was an almost blinding light. A huge silhouette descended from the heavens, complete with a large cross-like shape behind her back. The light faded, revealing a coat of white and grey through her face to behind her head. Her feet, fingertips, and cross on her back gleamed gold. Finally, her red eyes with green sclera opened. "Do I know how to make an entrance or what? As I'm sure you've concluded, I'm Arceus." she announced, smiling.

Matt had certainly heard of Arceus. But didn't one need to play an Azure Flute to summon her? And no tale mentioned her beauty. 150 feet tall, slim, toned, and voluptuous. Her gown flowed as though comprised of light, and she wore a necklace holding her various Plates that would take him both hands just to lift even one. "W-what do you mean by 'fashioned for myself'?" Rose asked, unsure if she should be averting her gaze or not.

"Is this not what you wished for? To be bigger?" was Arceus' response.

"Well...yeah, I did wish to be bigger, but I think I made a mistake in wishing it..." Rose admitted.

"Wait, what would you know of Rose's wish, Arceus? Er, n-no offense..." Matt questioned carefully.

Arceus giggled lightly and answered, "I granted it, Matt. Most wishes go through me when they're made, but are rarely granted. I found Rose's wish to be an intriguing one, so I granted it to her." she then informed Rose, "A mistake? Oh no, I'm well aware of what you meant when you were making the wish. But if it's intriguing enough to get me off ye olde galactic couch and grant it, why not go all the way with it?"

"Y-you mean...my growth will never s-stop?" Rose asked, mostly in fear yet also with a hint of arousal.

With a shrug of her shoulders, Arceus responded, "Only if you want... I meant I granted you the ability to change your size at will. As a bonus, your senses can be adjusted in the same manner. Including...certain ones."

"So what's the catch? Couldn't you just summon us to the Hall of Origin for this?" Matt inquired, scarcely believing Arceus of all beings would appear before them personally without some sort of string attached.

A pokemorphic Eevee, 1000 feet tall to match the Vulpix, stepped towards the destructive vixen. she raised her fists in a kind of boxing stance, her eyes glaring with conviction, a dark blue bandana billowing in the wind behind her enormous and sensitive ears.

"You think it's funny? Satisfying yourself on the pain and anguish of the innocents?" the eevee said with a tone of disgust.

"You should try sometime, it's so much easier than helping them, besides, they can make more of themselves pretty quick." the Vulpix smiled wickedly, her hand piercing a nearby building from pressing her fingers on the surface. she swept her arm down, causing the building to collapse inward, a cloud of dust up to their knee billowed outward into the street and throughout the park.

Matt watched from the top of the building the gargantuan Eevee had placed him. He was quite captivated with her sturdy hour-glass figure, her mane of hair covering the top of her torso in in all directions. Matt's eyes focused more on her closest feature, her small, solid behind, and her single bushy tail sweeping back and forth in anticipation for this fight.

"If you spend all your time endulging yourself, you'll get fat, and then people could walk to get away from you...fat ass." The Eevee said with a smug smile. The hairs on the Vulpix's tail quivered with rage. "Eat this you Bitch!!!" she reared her head back taking a deep breath then threw herself forward, letting loose a wave of fire that swept down the street, melting the face of the buildings along the way.

Matt's nearly shit himself as his all-consuming flaming death approached at an unavoidalbe speed. But the Eevee centered herself with the flames and flew forward, a wall of water forming around her as she hurtled through the flames, making mostly harmless steam. The Vulpix realized only too late what was going on and wasn't able to cancel her attack before getting cracked in the face by her much more experienced opponent.

"How the hell?! You're not a Water-type!" the Vulpix said indignently as she pulled herself out of the wreckage of some crushed skyscrapers. "It's called Waterfall, It's just a rushing tackle with the added benefit of being a water attack." the Eevee replied, cracking her knuckles, "So, you want some more?"

The Vulpix hesitated, then finally, admitting defeat, "Fine, I'll leave, but I'll make you pay someday." she said, making a note of stomping every stepped, and walking right into buildings.

The Eevee turned away.

You had always loved pokemon battles, from an early age you had wanted to become an undefeatable battler. You had earned quite a reputation as a trainer heading to the most remote and dangerous places looking for strong pokemon. Finally an old man told you about a place where the world's strongest fire types lived named flame valley and that within flame valley there was an ninetails that had apparently taken on the whole valley at once and won. Needless to say you convinced the old man to give you a map to the place. After 3 days of walking you came to a cliff face and looked down, you couldn't see the bottom of the cliff face. You pull out a rope and set up an anchor before starting to scale down it took you so long to lower yourself it was late afternoon by the time you saw what you presume is a bottom. You climb down the last hundred or feet and land on a patch of patch of grass unlike any you felt before.

The grass was beige colored and as you looked in one direction you saw 2 hills while in the other the grass seemed to just drop off. You walk toward the hills and the ground seemed to move as you stepped, up down up down, although you told yourself that you're just tired from the long trek down. You reach the 2 hills and notice that they're twice you're size so maybe 12 feet tall at max. You look around and seeing no better spot as this as it was protected from the wind except for the wind coming from right in front of you, you lay out you're sleeping bag in the furrow between the 2. You quickly get snuggled up in you're sleeping bag and fall asleep vowing to find and catch this undefeatable ninetails. You wake up very early and sit up, you were kind of confused as you still felt the same slight wind you felt last night. Paying it no heed you don't look behind (where her face is) and you quickly get packed up. Yoou walk forward and head right jumping off the field of beige grass you land on the ground a few feet below. The sudden change in geography confuses you and you run up a nearby hill to get a better look.

"Oh my god" you say. Looking down you notice that the "field" you had been walking and sleeping on was the body of a gigantic anthro ninetails. "This just got a lot harder" you think, searching through you're backpack you find you're pokeballs but only a few were made to catch anthro pokemon and they weren't designed to catch something this big. You freeze as the ninetails in front of you yawns and stretches upwards, she turns over and stares directly at you and you're bag full of pokeballs.

"I'm fine with helping in whatever way I can" Nia says. The whole crowd cheers and preparations are started.

1 week later a long black car rolled up in front of you're house, out of the car walk 2 people one you recognized as the head of the pokemon league and the other as a highly respected pokemon proffessor. The head of the league a man with a really rugged look walks up and says "I'm vincent, so where is this undefeated ninetails i've heard of."

"Oh she's out back" you say, you walk around the house and Vincent stops dead in his tracks as soon as he sees Nia. "Nia you're challenger is here" you yell, she turns and looks down.smiling at the man next to you.

"Well let's get this started" Vincent says, he throws out 6 pokeballs and to you're suprise calls out the 3 regis as well as a charizard, a slamence and a dragonite. However the battle wasn't even much to talk about even though Vincent's pokemon did have the will to fight all Nia needed to do was flick them and they'd go flying most of the time running into a tree or a rock and getting knocked out. You estimate the match lasted a little more then a minute and after the last pokemon had been returned to it's ball Vincent looks over at you and says "kid I have no idea how you got that ninetails to listen to you but you have you're badge and funding." The pokemon professor walks up and studies Nia although she had been hit by a few very powerful hyperbeams and a few flamethrowers there seemed to be no damage to her what so ever. The proffessor is just about to touch her when you run up and grab his hand "what are you doing?" you ask.

"Of course just nowhere too private" she replies. You laugh out loud at the face the professor had when he heard her talk and he begins to examine her finishing in a half an hour.

"Well on behalf of the pokemon league committee, I just want to say congratulations, and that is one tough ninetails" Vincent says before getting into the car and driving away. "No I mean more than that" you say hiding in her tails. She unwraps her tails and leans forward staring down at you, "say that one more time?"

"I love you and it's as more then just a pokemon and trainer" you say. You're pushed back forcibly into her tails as she kisses you with all her might.

You spend the next half hour shaking people's hands and having the guys congratulate you. The women of the town lead Nia away and the guys lead you away.

"Hey what's going on?" you ask.

"Nothing, the girls just need to learn what kind of dress Nia will want and we need to plan you're stag party" Tom says smiling.

"I'd really rather not have one actually, I don't want Nia getting mad at me now that she said yes" you say.

"Oh don't worry we won't plan anything too bad, it'll be on thursday that way you can get wasted with the guys and it won't affect you're wedding" Tom says smiling. You believe him but little did you know what he had prepared.

On Thursday night

You enter the town's local bar and head for the room with the banner "Matt's stag party" over it. You open the door and gasp at what you saw, they had rented out the whole place so you knew there'd be a lot of people but there were a lot more people than you expected. Tim walks up and shakes you're hand "welcome to you're stag man," "the buffet and beer is over there" he says indicating a table and the entertainment will arrive in a few minutes. You walk over to the refreshment table and grab a few things, not wanting to get drunk even though it was you're stag you grab a can of coca-cola instead of one of the probable 20 different kinds of alcohol. You sit on a chair and have most of the guys in town come up and shake you're hand and congratulate you. Strangely enough they were all grinning like they were in on some big joke, after 5 minutes the lights turn off and you hear tom's voice on a loudspeaker. "Ok boys are you ready for the entertainment?" You hear hooting and hollering from all around you and the lights turn back on. Standing on stage are 5 anthromorphic ninetails but they ranged from 20 to 50ft tall and the tallest was holding a microphone.

"Hi i'm Flame and these fine young ladies are my associates, we're here to turn you're night from cold and lonely, to hot and full of passion" she says.

You glare angrily at tom, "what the hell Tom, I told you nothing that could get me in trouble" you yell.

"Oh come on Matt, you've spent so long looking for the strongest pokemon can't you just live a little for once." Tom says putting his arm around you're shoulder.

"No I can't" you say shrugging him off "i'm heading home, everyone else can enjoy this but not me" you say heading towards the door. You're grabbed by 2 men and Tom says "Matt these girls aren't cheap, the least you could do is go and say hi" he says. The rest of the guys encircle you and you're carried up to the stage "hey this is Matt he's the one the party is for but he's kinda having cold feet" Tom says to Flame. The 2 guys carrying you throw you up on stage "take care Matt, you get Flame all to yourself" he says as the stage actually starts to rotate. You find yourself in another room and Flame offers you a hand "so is this you're first time?" she asks.

"Yeah, but I really should be going, don't worry i'll make sure they pay you" you say taking her hand.

"Oh but you haven't even tried me yet, besides I bet you're wife won't mind even if she's a pokemon" Flame says smiling.

"You ever heard of flame valley? my wife's a ninetails from there" you say.

"I was born there, maybe she's an acquiantance" Flame says. You move back and say "let me rephrase that, my wife is the ninetails of flame valley, you know 1,000 feet tall, undefeated, that ninetails."

Flame's fur goes from beige to white and she steps back "Kitnia's my sister, I heard she left but you're the guy she met" Flame says.

"Oh, you're Nia's sister well then I definitley can't do this" you say.

She nods but says "But you're my first client, my boss will fire me if I don't do atleast something with you.".

You reach into you're pocket and pull out you're house keys, you throw them to her and say "here, i'll be living with Nia from now on so you can have my house, all the bills have been paid off for the rest of my life, heck I even get free groceries delivered to my door every week." Flame just stands there stunned "you're giving me you're house?" she asks.

"Yeah but i'm gonna need like half the groceries when they show up" you say.

"Why would you do that, even though i'm her sister I just tried to have sex with you" Flame says.

"Well that doesn't matter, besides in a few days you'll be my sister in law, oh and you can invite those other girls to live with you too" you say.

She bows and says "I'll never forget this, my name's Nadia by the way"

"Good to meet you Nadia, now if you'll excuse me" you exit the room and pull out a cellphone. You call the phone in Nia's house and to you're suprise she picks up, you explain everything to her and close the phone before entering the room where the other guests are. You find the other guys had cornered the 4 ninetails and you were glad you called Nia. You walk up to Tom and say "hey Tom thanks for the present," "Oh no problem" he replies before you punch him in the face knocking him out. "Thanks for showing me how much of a bastard you are Tom" you say. "This party is over, everyone back away from the ninetails or else this gets violent" you yell. Everyone does leave the ninetails alone but they form a semi-circle around you, "What are you going to do about it" one of the guys says.

"3,2,1" you think, "nothing she is" you say pointing up as you hear the sound of beams cracking and Nia rips the top off the bar and looks in. "Now as I was saying anyone who wants to try anything can go ahead" you say smiling. The guys quickly scatter and you see the 4 ninetails run over to Nadia, Nia picks you up with 2 fingers and looks at you somewhat angrily but her expression quickly softens. She moves you closer to her muzzle and kisses you "thank you Matt" she says smiling, she looks down at the 5 ninetails and asks "are you all ok?" They nod and you smile, "um extended family?" you ask.

"They're my sisters" Nia says smiling, "you didn't think there was only one bigger then normal ninetails did you?" she asks.

"Well yes I did" you reply, Nia lowers her hand to the 5 other ninetails and they climb on. She walks home and puts her hand on the ground and they along with you dismount, "Matt I want you to meet my sisters Nadia, July, Janice, Elaine, and Nicole" she says. Each ninetails bow in turn, Nia touches you're house and to you're amazment it starts growing right in front of you till it's a fit size for Nia's sisters. She reaches in and somehow is able to touch the bed, couch and fridge increasing them to ample proportions as well. She sits back and sighs "phew that takes a lot out of a girl."
12223111111.title: She accepts

choices: her sisters and they want to go dress shopping
122231111111.content:
"Thank you" the 4 smaller ninetails say bowing.

"It's nothing, it's you're sister you should be thanking" you say. All 5 of them run up and hug a different part of Nia.

"Aww that's a nice family moment" you say.

"Is there anything we can do to show our appreciation Matt?" Nadia asks.

"You can come to our wedding as my personal guests" you say smiling.

"Oh we couldn't we've already caused you enough trouble" Janice says.

"It's no trouble Sis, what's a wedding if none of my family is there" Nia says. The 5 ninetails enter you're newly enlarged house you were sure to explore and get some rest and Nia picks you up and puts you down on her shoulder before heading to her house. You yawn and lay down on her shoulder, "man we're gonna have a heck of a time tomorrow" you say.

"Why's that?" Nia asks.

"Well not only do we need to get you're sisters dresses but I kind of knocked Tom out" you say.

"Oh why'd you do that?" Nia asks.

"Well he was the one who set up the whole party, and even though he's a pokemon professor he wasn't really trying to stop any of the patrons who were trying to touch you're sisters" you say.

"Well good thing you were there then" Nia says happily.

"Yeah I guess so" you reply. Nia enters her house and heads upstairs, she puts you down on the bed and lays down herself.

"Why am I so sleepy?" you say getting up, you run around the bed for a bit trying to wake yourself up it wasn't even that late about 10:00pm and you've stayed up for 2 days straight and not felt tired while looking for pokemon.

"Maybe because you're eager to get into bed" Nia says smiling.

"Maybe" you say smiling, but you still try to stay up moving around the bed. You feel Nia's tails wrap around you and you're lifted off you're feet and she holds you in front of her face. "Come on darling it's time to settle down and go to bed" she says.

"I don't want to settle down, this is honestly bugging me" you say.

"Well too bad becuase I want to sleep, so you're going to bed wether you like it or not" Nia says. She gives you a kiss before putting you down and laying down over top of you trapping you underneath her chest, "good night Matt" Nia says as she lays her head down.

"Good night Nia" you say. You fall asleep quickly as it was very warm and comfy where you were, you're sleep was peaceful, all you're dreams ended with you happily married with Nia. You wake up early and you look up to see Nia still sleeping. You're just able to slip out from between the squished hills surrounding you and you smile. "She's so cute while sleeping" you think happily. You climb up onto her head gently scratch her ear, "get up Nia it's only one day till you're my wife" you whisper into her ear.

"Mmmm, more more" she says laying out so you could have full access to her ears.

"Fine you spoiled ninetails" you say rubinng her ears with all you've got. You feel a slight breeze start up as her tails were wagging back and forth so quickly. You stop after a few minutes and Nia starts making a whining sound "moorreee" she whines.

"No you need to get up already" you say into her ear. You slide down her back as she lifts her head and yawns, jumping off just when she raises her back and stretches. She turns and looks at you for a second "you're a big meanie Matt" she says.

"What? how am I mean" you reply.

"You're beautiful wife asked something of you and you didn't do it" Nia says smiling.

"If I kept scratching you're ears you would never have gotten out of bed" you say.

"True, but what's so bad with spending the whole day next to me" Nia says.

"Nothing, but I already spoil you enough" you say. Nia kisses you pushing you back into the bed and then gently licks you for a few seconds "and what's wrong with me being a bit spoiled" she says.

"Nothing I just can't have you or me getting out of shape I mean i'll be a gym leader once the papers finally get through the dang mail system" you say.

"You worry too much" Nia says moving so she's facing you.

"Yeah I guess" you say laying out. Nia gently picks you up and cuddles you against her cheek "well come on trainer it's time to get up" she says smiling.

"Fine" you reply. Nia gets up and goes to the bathroom, she places you down on the counter, you undress and enter you're shower. You're just about to turn the water on when you hear a tapping sound, you stick you're head out and you see Nia smiling down at you. "Yes?" you ask.

"Um I was wondering if you'd like to joim me?" Nia asks.

"Sure" you say wrapping a towel around you're waits, Nia stares at you a bit suprised "really?" she asks.

"Yeah what kind trainer would I be if I didn't take care of my pokemon" you say smiling. Nia picks you up and puts you down on her shoulder. She steps into her shower and turns it on, you have to hold onto her fur as the water almost knocked you right off. Nia steps out of the stream "yeah I don't think that will work" you say.

"Ohh but I want you to join me" Nia says.

"I'll take care of you later" you say.

"Fine but you better do a really good job" Nia says somewhat peeved. She puts you down on the counter and you enter you're own shower. You hear Nia start singing before you start the stream and you take the towel you were wearing off as it wasn't much use now. You're shower lasts only a few minutes and you dry yourself off and exit the shower. You sit down on a large brush as it was part of the counter that wasn't soaked. Nia reaches out of the shower and starts feeling around, you try to push the brush to her hand and she grabs it. You hear her sing a bit before she shuts off the shower. She moves the curtain "eeek" she screams and jumps back a bit as she sees you sitting there waiting.

"What am I a mouse?" you ask trying to hold the laughter in.

"No, you just suprised me I thought you'd still be taking you're shower" Nia says.

"Nah that ended a while ago, you're pretty good at singing Nia" you say.

"Oh you heard me" Nia says blushing.

"Yeah it's nothing to be ashamed of I mean you're not the best but I liked it" you say.

"Thanks Matt, can you help me towel off?" Nia asks.

"I think you should do that yourself, if I was to do it we'd probably be here for a few hours" you say.

"Good point, and then i'd get that wet dog smell and I hate that" Nia says sticking her tongue out. She quickly towels off and picks you up before heading downstairs. She puts you down on the table. "Bacon and eggs?" she asks.

"Sure" you reply, you sit there and watch her as she grows the bacon and eggs to her size and then cooks in a pan using her own flamethrower. She places the scrambled eggs and slices of bacon on 2 plates and places them down before sitting down herself. There's not much talk for a bit as you both dig in but you finish before her and she eyes you're plate hungrily. "Go ahead not like i'm gonna eat it" you say. She grabs one piece of bacon flips it up and chomps down on it perfectly swallowing it whole, "ok i'm really not sure if I should find that impressive or terrifying" you say.

"Aww do I unnerve you a bit" Nia says smiling showing you her whole set of teeth.

"Not really but I can see why that foreman was a bit scared" you say having complete trust in Nia.

"Well i'm glad" Nia says as she lowers her muzzle and rubbing against you. You rub her cheek when you hear a knock at the door, Nia picks you up and opens it to find....
122231111111.title: They're all very grateful

1222311111111.content:
Standing there were all 5 of Nia's sisters. They smiled up at her and at you, Nia lowered you to the ground and you jumped onto the ground you smiled and ask"hey, what are you all doing here?"

"Well since you invited us to the wedding, we need dresses" Nadia says.

"Told you" you say without looking back, "alright well we actually still haven't gotten Nia a dress so let's go" you say even though you hated clothes shopping. Nia picked you up as well as everyone else all though it was a bit cramped. She ran off towards town and as you entered the city limits you were suprised to hear a police siren. Nia stops and you turn to see deputy Ellie ride up with Tom in the sidecar. Nia lowers you to the ground and you walk up to the officer "is there a problem?" you ask.

"Yes professor Tom here claims you beat him up, and you're ninetails damaged a bar" Ellie says.

"I did hit proffesor Tom, but only once, and yes Nia did rip the roof off the bar, but that was to protect her sister's from getting raped" you say as Nia lowers her sisters to the ground. Ellie stares at you and nod, "alright why did you hit Proffesor Tom" she asks.

"He wasn't trying to stop the patrons from trying to rape Nia's sisters, so I knocked him out" you say. Tom starts to protest but the deputy turns on him "is this true?" she asks.

"Well yes but..."Tom trails off as Nia lowers her face and growls at him.

"Don't worry Ms. we'll take care of him, have a good day all" Ellie says starting the bike and driving off.

"Glad that went well" you say sighing. "anyways let's get back to what we were doing" you say. You run in front and Nia and her sisters follow, you enter Janet's boutique which was the only dress store you knew of that offered wedding dresses. You find Janet at the counter "Hey Janet, can you get me some of you're tallest dresses as well as you're wedding dresses?" you ask.

"Oh still haven't gotten a dress?" she asks heading for the back of the stores.

"Yeah and now I need to get ones for all of Nia's sisters, do you mind if I take them out of the store?" you ask.

"Is the alternative Nia rips the roof off my store like she did the bar?" Janet asks.

"She only did that to protect her sisters" you reply.

Janet hands you a bunch of dresses, "here try these, oh and don't worry I trust ya, you've never done the town wrong before" Janet says.

"Thanks" you reply. You head out of the store and hand each ninetails a dress, Nadia a red one, July blue, Janice yellow, Elaine black, and Nicole yellow. Each girl starts putting on the dresses while you tentativley hold wedding dresses up and stare at each one then Nia. "What are you doing?" she asks.

"Picking you're wedding dress" you reply.

"You're a guy, you don't have any sense of fashion" Nia replies.

"True, but i'm the one who has to see you're beautiful butt in it and I want it to look good" you say.

"Give me those" Nia says lowering her hand, you hand the dresses over and Nia eyes each one before picking up a more traditional wedding dress. She looks it over once more before handing the rest back to you, "I pick this one" Nia says. You turn to see all of Nia's sisters wearing their dresses and each fit mostly perfectly although some of Nia's sisters had more prominent chest areas then were designed for the dress but other then that they were good. You sigh and carry the other dresses into the store and you find Janet smiling "I trust everyone liked their dresses. "Yeah i'll take everything except what's in my hands" you say, you pull out you're wallet and quickly have the dresses paid for. You leave the store as Janet yells "i'll be in the front row at you're wedding." Everyone is waiting with their dresses off, "so why'd you take me off?" you ask.

"They're too restrictive" Nadia says spinning and then stretching, Nia leans over and whispers "don't worry Matt i've already made the necesscary adjustments, but do you want to see me in it?"

"Nah i'm fine for right now, besides it'd be kind of weird if you were walking through town in a wedding dress" you whisper back. Nia blows over you knocking you over, "hey why'd you do that?" you ask sitting up.

"You don't understand a girl's heart" Nia says turning around and you sigh.

"Fine Nia, put it on" you say and she gives off a small squeal of joy. Nia looks around and quickly finds the tallest building in the area the Sliph research building. Nia runs and hides behind the builing, you just sat there and Nadia walks up and asks "so how'd you 2 meet?"

"Oh well I heard about her legend from an old man, i'm kind of a battle freak so I went looking for her, once I found her I beat her in a game of hide and seek and she agreed to be my pokemon and then to be mine" you say a happy look spreading over you're face as you say the end comment. You feel a few vibrations and you all look up to see Nia standing there in the dress. She looked absolutely beautiful, the white billowing dress surrounded her legs and her 9 tails flared out behind her like a setting sun, you looked up to see she even added ear holes to the dress. She leans down and looks right at you "well...how does it look?" she asks.

"Words can't describe how beautiful you look my precious ninetails" you reply stunned. Nia blushes furiously before saying "alright, well the dress is a go, let me go change and i'll take everyone home" she says. All of Nia's sisters burst out laughing "Bwahahaha, did you see her, she was so red, she looked like a charmander" Nicole says. Nadia walks up as she was the only one not laughing she lowers herself to be face to face with you and she says in a very serious tone "Matt I want you to make me a promise."

"Alright" you reply a bit unnerved.

"I've never seen my sister like that before, you're a very special person, so pleace watch over our sister" Nadia says.

"Of course, you don't need me to promise to do that" you reply. You feel reverabations a minute later and you turn to see Nia standing there, she holds the dress in one hand and lifts you up to her shoulder with her free hand before grabbing her sisters. Nia walks back to you're house within a minute and drops her sisters off, "take care of her" they all shout before Nia turns toward her house and starts running. She reaches the door with you somehow still on her shoulder and she stops before putting you down, she looks down at you and says "Matt this is the last chance, are you sure you want to marry me?"

"Of course, if I don't well then may Arceus strike me down here and now" you say. You look around and as there were no lightning bolts hitting you, you smile. "Nia stop doubting yourself, you're a beautiful ninetails who I love with all my heart" you say walking up and stroking her. Nia smiles and snuggles you into her chest before entering the house and heading upstairs to put the dress away. You're both shocked when you find Tom standing on the bed, he smiled as and turned as you entered "so you 2 are home, congratulations you're little goody-goody act cost me my position and a lot of grief, but thankfully I was able to buy my way out of jail" he says smiling.

"Tom what the hell" you yell but stop as he pulls out a 9mm with a laser sight and lines it up with you're head.

"You see, i've been secretly going at it with anthro pokemon for years, even got me a buisness on the side that exploited it, but oh no mister goody two shoes pokemon adventurer had to come and fuck it all up" Tom says.

"Dude since when were you this unstable" you say.

"The Tom you know is a fasad, this is what I am, you're death" he says pulling the trigger but you don't feel any pain instead you hear Nia give a yelp. Nia much to you're suprise not only blocks the bullet but lunges forward and you hear Tom gasp in suprise as Nia grabs him and squeezes a bit, he drops the gun and you jump down and stare at it.

"Hey Tom you do know I could kill you right now" you say and much to you're suprise you see Nia nod.

"But i'm not going to, that means sinking to you're level, oh and i'm gonna make sure you're jailed in an all anthro prison" you say. Nia holds Tom while you call the authorities and he's soon hauled off in a squad car and the gun is taken as evidence. Nia looks down to you as you wait and she gives you a lick, "you're a good man Matt" she says.

"Nah, I just can't bring myself to kill" you reply. You look over Nia's palm and you remove the bullet with her whimpering the whole time while you tried to keep her calm..
1222311111111.title: her sisters and they want to go dress shopping

12223111111111.content:
Nia moves to the couch after you put the tweezers you used to move the bullet away and threw the thing in the trash. Nia lays out and you sit in her palm, so Nia can I do anything for you?" you ask.

"Why?" she asks.

"Well you just kind of saved my life is all" you reply.

"It was nothing" Nia replies.

"Nia come on, i'll do anything" you say.

"Anything?" she replies a smile forming on her face. "Well then I want you to be my kit" she says.

"What?" you reply.

"Until tomorrow you will be my kit" Nia says smiling at you.

"Why?" you ask her.

"I always wanted to be able to mother something as i'm a bit too big for normal conception, so what do you say?" Nia asks.

"Fine, but only until tomorrow" you say. Nia lifts you up "aww I love you my little kit" she says nuzzling against you.

"I love you too mom" you reply. Nia giggles, "hmm now what should me and you do, take a bath?" she asks.

"No way, I already told you when you take a bath you start smelling like wet dog afterward" you reply. Nia sticks her tongue out at you, "fine then it's feeding time" she says. You were suprised as she sat up and moved you towards her breast "come on little one drink up, there's plenty of milk" she says gently pressing you against her breast. You knew this wasn't gonna work as she wasn't producing milk, that and her nipple was larger then you're head. You reach forward and slowly knead her breast, "oh that's it little one drink up" she says pressing you further against it. You tentativley gave a lick or 2 and Nia sighed before pulling you away. "Are you full now?" she asks.

"Yes Mother" you say lying.

"Good, now I know how about we play peekaboo" she says.

"I'd rather not" you reply flatly.

"Oh, someone developing an attitude" Nia says, you lower you're head, "sorry" you say.

"It's ok" Nia replies lifting you up and cuddling you against her cheek. "Let me show you my favorite game from back when I was a kit" Nia says. Before you can answer all 9 of her tails wrapped around you overlapping each other and covering you completely. You didn't say anything as Nia actually started to heat up her body temperature rising till it was like you were surrounded by a giant furry electric blanket but before you got too comfy you were thrown into the air. You don't even scream but Nia easily catches you back in her tails, "what the hell" you yell sitting up. Nia doesn't answer instead she wraps you up, heats up and throws you again. She repeats this about 5 times and by the end you were well a bit peeved simply because she wasn't answering you. Nia on the final catch moves her tails forward and deposits you in front of her.

"Well how was it?" she asks.

"What the heck was that?" you ask.

"Old ninetails game, the mother threw the kit up to foster trust and the heat is to let the kit know everything is okay" Nia says.

"Alright, yeah not really one for that game" you say sitting down.

"So what do you want to play?" Nia asks. You walk forward and climb up onto the top of her head "what are you doing?" she asks. You don't answer and you lay out over her head and start scratching her ears, Nia sighs and lays out over the couch, "oooh more more" she says. "As you command" you reply. You rubbed her ears for the next straight hour Nia sighing the whole time perfectly content to just lay on that couch and give off a small contented growl. Finally Nia lifts herself up which was a giant suprise to you and she pulls you off her head, "mmm good little kit taking care of you're mother" she says.

"I'm glad you're happy" you say hugging her cheek and Nia cuddles you gently, "well little kit what should I do with you?" she asks.

"No idea" you reply shrugging, "do you mind if we stop the whole kit, mom thing?" you ask.

"Aww but it's fun" Nia says.

"Well it is, but i'm kinda feeling uncomfortable" you say.

"Why?" Nia asks.

"Well i'm feeling pretty....endeared to you right now, and calling you mom if we did something it'd be weird" you say. Nia nods and smiles "alright enough time of kit and mother, now it's time for lovers" Nia says.

"I more meant cuddling, then you know sex" you say. Nia nods, "I know Matt, it's what I want too" she says cuddling you into her chest, "oh yeah I said I was gonna carry you in there from now on, and look what happens when I don't" she says.

"Nia that's not really necesscary" you say but Nia shakes her head "you almost died, because I wasn't watching you close enough, you don't leave my sight from now on love" she says lowering her head and licking you with just the tip of her tongue. "Fine, I guess I can deal with something like this" you say pretending to be really irritated. Nia stands up and her mounds hold you in place, "goody, now Matt it's time to go to bed, we have a big day tomorrow" Nia says. She walks upstairs stopping in the bathroom for a minute to let you do you're buisness and brush you're teeth, she smiled at you and her canines gleamed. "Matt do you ever find my smile scary?" she asks.

"Nope, most beautiful smile i've ever seen" you reply, she nuzzles you for a second "geez you flatterer" she says before picking you up and putting you back in her chest. She walks into the bedroom and carefully lies down in bed, she sighs and strokes you for a few seconds "tomorrow we'll be married, and i'll be the happiest ninetails in the world" Nia says.

"Pfft so i'll be the happiest guy in the world" you reply. Nia giggles, "hey Matt I never asked but why do humans not mind pokemon being naked?" she asks.

"Oh, well the male's part just goes in them so we don't even worry about them, same for the females you have this soft covering of fur" you reply rubbing her chest to prove you're point "that only disappears when you want it to, so it's no big deal to us" you say. Nia gently pokes you, "are you sure all you humans don't just like oggling us pokemon" she says.

"That might have something to do with it, although no one better oggle you or i'm gonna send em flying" you say. "My hero" Nia coos gently stroking you. You pulled yourself out of her chest and scampered down the bed to the little chest of drawers you had. It took you only a minute to change into pajamas and get snuggled back up with Nia. She yawned opening her cavernous mouth before laying her head down. "Good night Matt" she whispers.

"Good night Nia" you reply. You laid there for 10...20...30 minutes but you couldn't get to sleep you were too awake, you decide to go for a little run to tire yourself out so you run from the bottom to the top of the bed a couple of times. Finally you were sure you were tired out enough to go straight to sleep. You walked back to Nia and right when you're about to lay down she rolls over onto her back, "Matt I love you" she mumbles in her sleep gently stroking where you were. You couldn't help but smile up at the giant fox above you, "I love you too Nia, and from tomorrow on i'm all yours" you whisper before laying down and falling straight asleep.
12223111111111.title: Lavish Nia with attention

choices: Skip to the gym's first battle
122231111111111.content:
You were woken up slowly by soft shaking and a soft but incessant voice. "Wake up, wake up, wake up, wake up" it repeated again and again. You stirred and turned over your head running into something. You slowly open your eyes and look up to see the rest of Nia's face. Her muzzle moves forward and she gently kisses your upper body "good morning cutie" she says. "Good morning my beautiful fox" you reply hugging the front of her muzzle. Nia lifts her head up with you on it and turns over so that you land safely on her stomach, she sits up causing you to tumble backwards into her lap. Nia giggles "come on Matt if you can't even stand up on little ol me how are you supposed to guide me when a trainer comes" Nia says smiling down at you.

"I'll think of something. but that's really not important, not today anyway" you say.

Nia keeps smiling at you "your right, I mean today is the day you get stuck with me forever" she says picking you up and holding you to her cheek.

"That's my line" you reply kissing her cheek and getting a mouth full of fur for it. Nia giggles "let's just say we're stuck with each other" she says.

"That's probably for the best" you reply smiling. Nia puts you down on the bed and starts rummaging around in her closet for the dress "Matt I'm going to change downstairs, yell when your finished" she says finally finding the dress and then leaving the room. You rummaged around in your chest of drawers finally finding your tuxedo hidden under all your other clothes, you pull it out and stare at it for a second smiling. It only took you a few minutes to put the thing on and that was only because you had to make sure that everything was on correctly because you didn't have a mirror. You just sit down on the bed and yell "Nia I'm finished."

"Alright well I'm still changing, give me a minute" she yells back. You turn and look back at the clock 9:00am it read at you in big red numbers. You smiled "half an hour till I get married" you say to yourself. You were ecstatic, you had liked Nia ever since you first laid eyes on her. You heard the sound of paws on stairs and you turned just as Nia entered the doorway, she was standing there in the dress you had picked out but she was also carrying a small bouquet of flowers which she grew. She walks up and looks down at you "Matt, Matt are you okay?" she asks as you were staring at her pretty much open-mouthed.

You shake your body "fine, I'm fine, Nia you look gorgeous" you say smiling like an idiot.

Nia suprisingly blushes and turns away for a second before turning back "thank you Matt" she says. She lowers a hand and you jump on and she lifts you up to her shoulder, you look back over at that clock and it now read 9:10am.

"Shouldn't we get going?" you ask Nia. She nods and turns, "so who do you think will catch the bouquet?" she asks as she walks down the stairs.

"No one, no offense but I really don't want you throwing that thing, I mean those flowers are bigger then me" you say. Nia sighs "so then what do I do with it?" she asks.

"Take it home and put the flowers in a vase?" you reply really not sure yourself. She nods and walks out of the house, "so do we need to pick up your sisters?" you ask as Nia passes your old house.

"No we'll meet them at the church" Nia replies. You just sit there and suddenly a thought crosses your mind "hey Nia, who'll be giving you away?" you ask. "Why my sisters of course" she replies.

"So does that mean.....something happened to your parents?" you ask.

"No they just, lost touch with me" she says stooping she looks down kind of forlorn. You gently stroke her neck "don't be sad Nia today's supposed to be a happy day, I'll think of something" you say. She nods and keeps walking, it took you around 5 minutes to get to the church and Nia sits down in front of it. Nia sets you down and then almost jumps giving off a small squeek, she turns and stares at something, you walk over and you see a male ninetales with a female standing right to him but they unlike Nia or her sisters were more normal sized.

"Can I help you?" you ask walking up.

"Yes where do the bride's family sit?" he asks.

"Left side" you reply, you look up at Nia and she was just staring. "Hey Nia, hey" you shout up at her, she snaps out of the reverie she was in and quickly but gently lifts up and hugs the 2 ninetales. "Mom. Dad, you came" she says hugging the 2 tighter.

"I couldn't just let our daughter be married without us being there" the female ninetales replies. Nia puts the 2 down and smiles at you "Matt I'd like you to meet my mother Evelyn and my father Jonathon" Nia says.

"It's a pleasure" you say sticking out a hand, you shake hands and Jonathon looks up at Nia hesitantly. "Nia, is it alright if I....gave you away" he says.

Nia gives off a squeak of joy "of course you can, although it will have to be you and my sisters" she says. Jonathon smiles and walks into the church to wait with your family. You just sit around till a car pulls up and a priest walks out of the vehicle. He smiles up at Nia and walks past the 2 of you into the church, you heard something and the guests started to file out of the church before Nia's sisters and her father came and stood next to her and your parents came and stood near you. The priest walks out all smiles and then the immediate family moves back and takes places like the other guests sitting on the grass. The priest stands in front of you and holds up a book "ahem, we are gathered here to bind this man and Ninetales in matrimony, the bride and groom informed me that they would like to say their own vows, which they shall now read" he says closing the book.

You turn and look up at Nia "Nia I've loved you ever since I met you back in the valley, you are my joy and my light, my warm flame at night and my closest companion, will you take me as your husband?" you ask. Nia nods "I will" she replies.

"Matt you were wonderful ever since we met, even bringing a ribbon for little ol me" she says which you realize was the ribbon holding the flowers together. "You've taken care of me even when I went a little crazy and you deal with me even thought I must be such a bother, will you have me as your wife?" she finishes.

"Nia your not a bother at all, and I want no other but you" you reply. The priest gives off a small cough "now the bride and groom will exchange rings" eh says. 3 people carried up a ring with a diamond the size of a fist on it, "Nia when I said that was the best I could afford" you say indicating her engagement ring "I kind of lied a bit." Nia just stares at the ring and gently picks it up and puts it on "oh Matt it's beautiful" she says. She reaches around and somehow pulls a ring from her tails "it wasn't easy to hide this" she says, her ring was just a simple band of gold although engraved all around it were pictures of a happy ninetales and it's trainer playing, cuddling and even resting together. Nia lowers the ring over top of you and smiles, although she does have to remove it a few seconds later. The priest gives off another cough and the 2 of you turn "by the power vested in me, I now pronounce you husband and wife, you may now kiss the bride" he says. Nia however takes the initiative and pushes you backwards into the grass, she lets up after a few seconds "I love you matt" she says.

"I love you too Nia" you reply standing up and everyone erupted into cheers.
122231111111111.title: Wedding day

1311.content:
You walk through he depths of the forest. Not that you are trying to catch any pokemon or to travel another city, it's just like you enjoy walking in the forests. It makes you feel... relaxed.

Then, suddenly, you feel a tickling sensation on your back. Like a giant finger is running down your spine. Shivering, you turn around to see... Nothing.
'Weird.' you think, before slowly resuming walking.

But a noise makes you stop once again. It's not the rustling of the bushes nor the sound of a pokemon approaching. No, it seems more like a... like a giggle...

Weirded out, you resume walking, in a fast motion. Too fast. In fact, you end up bumping into something soft. Pulling back, you see you just ran into a massive wall of pink fur.

Taking a few steps back, your jaw drops. In front of you is standing the huge figure of giant Mew!

Before you can act, the pink pokemon reaches out for you. A stubby paw grabs you and brings you up to the Mew's face.
"Hi there! I'm Mew!" it exclaims, sounding female.
"Nice to meet you!".
"H-Hi..." you reply.
"So little guy, what's someone as small and cute like you doing in this forest?" she asks.
"Um, I was just walking around..." you admit.

"You mean... You're not here to fight me and catch me?" she asks.
"No. I didn't even know about you until now. Now could you put me down, so I can go home?" you ask hopeful.

Mew reluctantly puts you on the ground. You slowly walk off. After a few moments, you turn around. Mew is still there, still looking at you.

You resume walking. You turn around again. Mew is still looking at you. Weirdly, it seems that you didn't get any far from her. It takes you a few moments to realize she's following you!

"Mew why are you following me?" you ask.
She blushes, before sighing.
"I'll tell you, you're the first one that didn't come here to try and catch me... and I feel like I can trust you... Shortly, can you catch me?" she asks.
"What?".

"Yes. I don't have anyone to play with, so can I come with you?"
"... Sure... Why not?" you reply, pulling out a pokeball. Cheering, Mew tabs the ball, disappearing into it.

You don't even have time to wonder what the heck just happened when Mew pops out of the ball and hugs you.
"Thank you!" she yells, before scooping you in her paw.
"Now master," she giggles at this.
"Wanna....
1311.title: Mew

13112.content:
I’ll add to this story sporadically, but I’ll try to write when I can. Now, onto the story! (Pls notice my work Blue Fox)

“Sure.” you reply, “But what are we going to eat? I didn’t bring much, I just planned to take a quick trip.”

“Well, what did you bring?” Mew asks.

“Well... pretty much the only food I have with me is a sandwich and a cookie.” you admit, scratching your head.

“That’s it? I doubt that would last one of us the whole night, much less both of us!” Mew states.

“Well, I think we could get out of here and go someplace to eat. We’d lose a lot of sleep though. Alternatively, we could try and split what we have and wake up really hungry tomorrow morning.” you say, creating a dilemma.

“I wouldn’t want to wake up hungry! When my belly’s empty, my vitality drains and before I know it, I always faint. Speaking of which, this place is called Mysery Jungle, though you likely already knew that.” Mew states, speaking her opinion.

With that, you are left with two decisions. You can either go find a place to eat and lose a lot of sleep, or get some sleep and wake up hungry.
13112.title: Discussing options with Mew

choices: "Can it wait until tomorrow? I'm kinda sleepy..." you reply
131121.content:
"Well... if that's so... let's go find someplace to eat then..." you say, rubbing your head.
"I don't quite know how I could deal with a 200ft fainted pokemon..."

Seriously, you were still quite confused. This started with you taking a stroll in the woods and ended with you having to deal with a giant hungry pokemon who decided to stick with you.

That was a lot to take in.

And who guaranteed she wasn't going to make you her dinner at some point? Sure, Mew proved to be playful, but also very gentle, but...

You sigh. You could trust her for now, you guessed...

Mew giggled playfully as her tail slid in between your legs and lifted you off the ground, before coiling around your waist.

"Great - where do we go? There should be some berry trees around here..." Mew suggests as she hungrily looked around.
"... Do berries really fill you up?" you ask, incredulous. How could such tiny things satisfy such big pokemon?

Mew smiled.
"At times, yes. I have to eat like a ton, and I'm not even close to being filled." she said.

"... Ever tried hunting?" you ask as Mew starts to float deeper into Mystery Jungle.

Even though you couldn't see her face, she blushes.
"Once or twice? Yeah... and it was extremely awkward - seriously, ever tried eating someone when they're still alive? I don't have the heart to kill..." she said.

"I understand..." you responded, before your stomach growled, expressing its hunger.

You sighed.
"Mew... I think we could back to my place to get something to eat... it'll take an hour or two to get there though..." you say.

"... Ehm... wouldn't people kinda freak out seeing me?" the giantess asks from behind you, her tail rising up to her face.

"... I live near the forest, I don't have any neighbors..." you state, trying to fight off the huge sense of vertigo you're having at such height.

Mew nods happily, her sapphire eyes sparkling with excitement.
"Okay then! I don't usually get out of this forest... it'll be fun!" she exclaims.

--

After three hours of lazily floating through the forest, chatting with Mew as your only source of entertainment, the giantess finally gets out of Mystery Jungle.

It was the middle of the night, you also noted. A quick glance at your watch told you that it was 2 A.M.

"Which way?" Mew asks, snapping you out of your thoughts, again rising her tail up to her face.

This time, she holds out a stubby paw to let you on it... only for you to fall on your butt, your legs having fallen asleep after three whole hours of hanging from Mew's tail.

You groan.
"That way..." you say, pointing to North.

Mew nods a few times, before starting to float forward.

And, soon enough, a house comes into view... your house. From this height, you note, it's like a mere dollhouse to Mew.

"There." you say, causing the giantess to halt and gently put you back down on the solid ground.

Quietly, you pull out your keys and stumble to the front door, unlocking it before entering the house.

You walk into your kitchen and grab some meat and fruit. You walk back out of the house, discovering that Mew laid down.

"Well... I brought you something... Hopefully it will fill you..." you say.

Mew smiled.

--

"Tasty!" Mew chimed in satisfaction as she pats her giant stomach.

"Yeah... easier to eat meat when it isn't alive?" you remark, causing Mew to go giggle.

You smiled, before yawning.
"Well... we ate. Let's hit the hay." you suggest.

Mew looks at you, those sapphire eyes fixing straight on you.
"Wait... can't we stay here some more? I'd like to talk to you..." she admits.

"... About?" you asked, yawning again and looking at your watch.

3 A.M.

"I'm usually sleeping by now..." you remark as you look at the pink giantess, who slowly leans down, her gigantic muzzle landing inches from you, her face at least twenty times your whole body.

"Well... let's know each other better..." she suggests cheerfully.

You yawn again.
131121.title: Search for food and bonding

choices: Go ahead and warn the people
132211.content: You are Matt, a pokemon trainer that is always traveling, searching for powerful and rare pokemon. Today you are walking through a well known forest, the Ilex forest, in the Johto region. You heard that there is an incredibly powerful grass pokemon that guards this forest. You are walking for a hours now and, weirdly enough, you didn't encounter any pokemon, not even a Weedle. The ground is unusually coloured dark green here. You just ignore it and keep going, thinking that it's just grass. Suddenly you stop, two hills in front of you. You stare at them confused, wondering how such things are here, in the middle of a forest. Suddenly the ground starts to raise. You almost lose your balance, but you manage to see the huge green face of a pokemon, that you recognize as Celebi. She's apparently asleep. Wait, so this means you are standing on the belly of an about 200 ft tall anthro Celebi, and it also means that the two hills you saw before are... her breasts. The "ground" lowers again with her breath. You take the opportunity and jump off her body, but she feels the movement and her breath suddenly interrupts. She then opens her eyes and looks around, spotting you. Celebi then slowly gets up and looks at you for a second, before smiling "Oh goody, a challenger. Are you here to try and take me on trainer?" she asks. You nod slowly as she smiles again and gets in front of you. Her legs are like trees to you "Ready when you are, throw out whatever you've got" she says. You nod as you call your strongest fire pokemon, a Flareon named Flame. She emerges from her pokeball, just to run and hide behind you as soon she sees Celebi. The grass type pokemon pouts "Awww, one pokemon, that's no fun" she says. You recall Flame back as Celebi speaks again "Since your pokemon doesn't seem up to fight, why don't you challenge me?" she asks "How do I do that?" "Well, it's simple. If you can avoid me for a whole minute, you win, and I'll do something you want . If I manage to touch you, I win" she explains "What if I lose?" "You either become my slave or plaything. Your choice" she says. You shiver at the thought as Celebi gets a few meters away from you "Get ready, cause here I come!" she says dashing, or rather flying at full speed, towards you. Luckily you manage it sidestep, but Celebi quickly turns in your direction and charges you again. You duck, and she flies past you, but she quickly turns around "You're mine!" she exclaims dashing towards you. You try to move, but you trip and fall tot the ground. Celebi's smile grows wider, but is soon replaced by an annoyed expression. You hear her groan and slowly get up "What?" you ask "Time's up" she says in a huff "Looks like you won". You smile as Celebi gets near you "So? What do I have to do?" she asks smiling a bit "Well, telling you the truth, I came here to catch the powrful grass pokemon that guarded this forest..." you reclutantly say "Is that so?" Celebi asks smiling "Well yeah. You know what, forget about what I said, I'll leave and never come back" you quickly say. In response Celebi gets really near you. You close your eyes, expecting for her to hurt you, but instead you feel yourself being picked up and pressed against a surface. You open your eyes to see Celebi hugging you "What are you doing?" you ask "Just hugging my trainer. You know, we haven't introduced yet. I'm Celia" she says "W-wait, trainer? What do you mean?" you ask shocked "That I'll be your pokemon. And now, would you be so kind to tell me how have I to call my master?" she asks smiling "I'm Matt" you reply. Celia smiles in response and then looks at you again "Now, Matt, do you have any questions?" she asks "Well... for starters, how do you eat?" you ask "I eat nothing more than a normal pokemon. As long it isn't meat, I'm fine with everything" she replies "And where will you sleep?" "I'm fine with sleeping outside. It's not like someone will try to steal me, right?" she says. You nod as she giggles "Come on, show me where you live, so I'll get us there" she says "That direction" you say, pointing to north. Celia nods as she starts flying in that direction, holding you in a soft hug. After ten minutes of flying she stops "Matt, I see a town. Do you live there?" she asks "Yeah. I just wonder how can we get you enter...
132211.title: Enter Celebi

1322111.content: You decide that it's better to warn the people about Celia. Otherwise, this could end bad "Celia? Can you put me down? I'll go warn the people" you say. The gigantic Celebi looks at you "Why?" she asks in a somewhat annoyed tone "Because what will they think if they see a titanic Celebi flying in the city? They would think of you as a monster. And we don't want that, right?" you say. Celia takes a moment to realize what you just said, before nodding in approval. She then gently puts you on the ground. You start walking towards the city. You see a group of people talking "What could have been that huge shadow?"you hear one of them say. Obviously, Celia would never pass unseen due to her size. With a sigh, you approach the group "Excuse me, but I think I have the answer" you say. In a moment, everyone's gaze focus on you. A moment passes, before a man decides to speak up "And that would be?" he asks "Well, I think that's my pokemon..." you say "Your pokemon? What did you catch, a legendary?" someone else asks. Your silence is an enough answer "What? You caught a legendary?" they ask shocked. You nod "Come on Celia, come here" you call out. Instantly a huge shadow, that you recognize as Celia's, falls over you and the people. Celia flies behind you. The people stare at her with their mouths wide open; but it's just a moment before they freak out and start screaming "She's gonna eat us!" someone yells "Calm down please!" you say, trying to stop them. The people completely ignore you " Please calm down!" you repeat, with the same result as before. Just then Celia decides to act for you "My master said CALM DOWN!" she yells. Everyone freezes in place as you speak again "Listen to me, Celia won't hurt anyone" you say "As for eating, she won't eat anyone" "That's true. I'm strictly vegetarian" Celia confirms. The people start to calm down at your explanations "And what will she eat?" an old man asks "I have that covered" you reply "We just wish to live in peace" you end starting to leave, but Celia snatches you in her hand and looks at you "Where's your house cutie?" she asks "There. You're lucky it's just in front of a hill, so you'll have all the space to sleep" you say pointing to your house. Celia smiles as she flies towards it. She puts you in front of the frotn door "Wait me here" you say running in the house and getting some pokemon food. You then get out to find Celia still waiting for you "Is that food?" she asks eyeing the poke food in your hand "Yes, dig in" you say launching it in the air. Celia catches it with her mouth and swallows it whole "Tasty!" she says licking her lips satisfied. You smile as she lowers her head to you "So Matt, now that you have me" she says "What are your plans?"

1323321.content:
Matt brushed a hand through his hair, knocking loose a stuck twig and wiping away some sweat. The forest around him was gradually growing thinner as he made his way to the great Northwind cliffs, but still dense enough that he couldn't get a good view of anything but trees and plants. The roaring thunder of the falls was growing ever louder as he approached, drawing him on, guiding him without need for a map.
Finally, he saw a hint of blue in the distance. Matt broke into a run, overjoyed that his journey would soon be over. As he rushed past the woods, the blue sky slipped through more and more openings in the foliage, until finally it dominated Matt's view.
Matt almost didn't manage to slow down in time, gasping in apprehension as he skidded to a halt less than a foot from the sudden dropoff. A handful of stones were kicked up by his arrival and bounced down to the lake waters nearly five hundred feet below. Matt watched the stones vanish into the distance, completely obscured by the deep mists of the falls, before letting his gaze rise upon the fruits of his travels.

It was truly an amazing sight. Down the cliff face, a great lake glistened in the midday sun, surrounded by an endless forest stretching into the horizon. Few had ever set foot in these forests, too afraid of the legends of it's incredible magical protector, but Matt was glad he had finally overcome his fears and ventured forth. He wasn't sure where he had found the courage to make the long trek through the woods, but even the tales of the Goddess-like guardian of the Northwind continent hadn't been enough to keep him away.
"Wow..."
"Magnificent, isn't it, Matthew?"
"Yeah, I've never seen such a beautiGYAH!!!"

Matt grabbed the nearest solid object he could find (it happened to be a tree in this case) and held on for dear life, praying that he hadn't seen what he thought he had just seen.
"PLEASE DON'T EAT ME!!!"
Matt cowered against the tree, waiting for his life to flash before his eyes. Instead, he heard gentle laughter and a melodic voice no louder than his own.
"Even if I wished to eat you, there would be no point. I doubt I could even taste your tiny body. Open your eyes, little one."
"Do I have to?"
"I would prefer if you did."
Matt didn't want to, but he had to admit to himself that he was more concerned with what might happen if the owner of the voice grew displeased. Slowly, he opened his eyes and looked at the speaker again.

She was big. That was the first thing anyone seeing her would walk away with, no question. She was also blue. That part kind of jumped out as well. And she was big. Really big. In fact, it took several seconds of looking up and down the length of her massive body for Matt to get a good grasp on what it was he was addressing.
She was an impossibly huge creature, and not human. Her skin was covered in a dense layer of silky blue fur decorated with white diamond shapes, and her body was clothed only in a pair of white ribbons loosely hung across her shoulders. She was sitting in the lake below- not standing, sitting. Her back leaned against the cliffside, positioned directly in the middle of the waterfall, diverting it's torrential flow. Her shoulders were above the ground, arms spread out and resting along the treetops. Even further into the sky, her tremendous face loomed in the air, smiling down with sparkling red eyes. Long, thick, wavy purple hair flowed from her head, vanishing with the rest of her body in the distant mists below. Atop her head, she wore a magnificent aquamarine crown, encrusted with thousands of flawless jewels larger than most people. In it's center, a hexagonal blue ring-shaped gem over a hundred feet long seemed to glow with a radiance rivaling the sun itself.

"Welcome to my forest, little one."
"H-h-h-h-h-h-hi."
"Why are you afraid? I have bestowed an unprecedented blessing upon you. Not only have I drawn you to this place, the grandest vista within all of my domain, I have even deemed you worthy to behold my radiant presence. Are you not honored?"
"Y-y-y-y-y-y-yes."

"Then why do you hide behind a tree, as if displeased with what you gaze upon?"
"N-n-n-n-n-n-no reason."
"Then please, little one, step forward."
The tremendous Suicine woman held out a hand, placing it against the side of the cliff. Swallowing hard, Matt slowly crawled out from behind the tree and walked towards the open palm. He climbed onto a finger and was able to stand on it quite comfortably- he couldn't have seemed bigger than half an inch to the Goddess-like Pokemon relaxing against the towering falls.
Matt's stomach churned as she lifted her hand up to her face, hovering over her mountainous breasts. Lips taller than his body parted, revealing teeth he didn't even want to think about comparing to any part of his body.
"Now then, little one, it is time for me to tell you why I have led you here...
1323321.title: The Goddess of the Northwind continent

13233211.content:
"I have grown lonely in my long years protecting this place, and that is why i sent for you" said the giant Suicine as she continued to hold Matt apon her palm
Matt was shocked "but what does that have to do with me?" he asked as continued to watch her glistening blue fur flow in the breeze
she chuckled at this "I wish for you to stay with me, and perhaps in time become my mate" she said as she ever so slowly shifted her hand to rest Matt on her shoulder
"but why me"
"that is simple you have no one to notice you are gone or for you to regret leaving. You have been raised by pokemon and other anthro's and are accepting of our kind, and finnaly your staring proves that you are attracted to me" she smiled as he averted his gaze from her breast

"but all in good time, for now i shall take you back to my den, and you can decide tomorrow" with those words she raised herself from the lake & took many strides towards a mountain range, that on foot for Matt would have taken him many hours but she had reached the mountains in under 5 minutes.

as she aproached the mountains she turned to look at Matt "i'll have to carry you for this, or you will fall off" with those words spoken she grasped Matt in her hands, and jumped clean over the seemingly inpenetrable mountains to land in a secluded glade where the trees were huge although to the Suicine they were waist height

She returned Matt to her shoulder "Is this were you live?" asked Matt
"of course here i can relax in solitude with out fear of human's, the mountains are inpenetrable for climbers and due to wind currents none of their flying machines can reach me. We are here, home sweet home!" she sighed
Matt looked around but could see nothing that resembled a den "umm were i dont see anything"
