"Well all's forgiven, becuase I got a pokemon" you say smiling.

"Oh cool, where is it?" they ask.

"Out back, come on" you say running ahead. You enter the backyard of you're house and you see Tiffany had rolled over.

"Hey dude we don't see anything just that weird big red and yellow thing what'd you catch a 50ft magmar?" they ask.

"Better" you say walking up to Tiffany's back. "Tiffany, come on Tiffany wake up, I have some people I want you to meet" you say. You quickly move back as Tiffany turns over and stretches, "guys I want you to meet the legendary blaziken Tiffany" you smile as their all staring at you open-mouthed. You turn to see Tiffany opening her eyes and she smiles as she sees you.

"Morning' she says hugging you.

"Morning" you reply, she turns and notices you're friends. "Who are they?" she asks.

"My friends, the ones who dared me to enter the valley" you say. She turns to stare at them and they cringe "hi" they say shakily.

"Oh stop being such chickens" you say laughing at the joke, "she's harmless, and very friendly" you say smiling at her. Joe the bravest one of you're friends walks forward but he's snatched up in her palm "mmm what a tasty looking morsel you are" she says opening her mouth and Joe starts screaming and you're other friends try to run away but she gets up and jumps in front of them blocking their path "you all look very tasty" she says a grin on her beak.

'Call-call her off man, we're sorry about the dare and almost getting you stuck in the valley" they say shuddering.

"Tiffany stop it, they're scared enough" you say walking up.

"Fine" she says putting Joe down "Nyah that's what you get for tricking my trainer" she says sticking her tongue out at them. You're friends split after that coming up with various excuses like "my stove is on" and "I need to brush my growlithe". You walk inside and rummage around the fridge taking out all the non-expiring food, get all the money out of the small safe you have and pack all the food and water you can carry into a knapsack. You even grab the large bag of pokefood you kept in the back just in case and you're just able to fit that in the bag.

"What are you doing?" Tiffany asks.

"Well they're probably going to tell the town about you, and considering you scared them so bad, they'll probably portray you as a monster, so we're leaving" you reply zipping up the bag.

"Where are we going?" she asks.

"We're going to take on the pokemon league" you reply.

"Pokemon league?" she asks confused.

"It's a set of challenging battles in gyms, that eventually lead to the pokemon league where you have to fight the 4 toughest trainers in the area as well as the champion in quick succession, but I think we'll be fine" you say smiling.

"Fine, as long as I get to be near you" Tiffany replies. She picks you up and smiles "i'm sorry Matt, I just caused you trouble" she says.

"It's fine, it was worth it to see the look on their faces, you wouldn't have really hurt them would you?" you ask.

"Of course not, i'm strictly vegetarian" Tiffany replies.
154121.title: Go back to you're old life with Tiffany

choices: head for the next town and try to find a pokecenter
1541211.content:
You guided Tiffany down the small dirt road, "where are we going?" she asks.

"New light city, the gym leader there uses grass types, though he'd be a good first match up" you say. Tiffany walked for hours, singing, whistling or humming, you had to stop a few times as you'd join in and you both would soon be laughing so hard she almost dropped you. You reached New light city by mid afternoon, Tiffany being way faster then a bike or even some cars.

"Can you put me down?" you ask and she does. "I'm sorry Tiffany but I think people would be freaked if they saw you, so can you wait in the woods while I go get the gym leader" you ask. Tiffany reluctantly nods and runs off into the forest, you head for the town, it was a small town, so it wasn't like it was hard to find the gym. You saw a young man standing in front admiring the building, you walk up to him. "You also hear to take on the gym leader?" you ask.

"No, I am the gym leader, name's Joe Seedroot" he says turning to you.

"Oh, hi Joe, i'm Matt and i'm here to challenge you're gym" you say.

"Sure 3 on 3 good with you" Joe asks.

"Um..1 on 3" you say, "I only have one pokemon" you say. Joe looks at you "where's you're pokeballs" he asks.

"Oh my pokemon doesn't travel in a ball, in fact we have to go into the forest to have the battle for space purposes" you say.

Joe looks at you shocked, "what'd you do catch a legendary" he asks.

"Something like that" you reply Joe follows you outside of the town limits and you head through the forest till you reach a large clearing, you look around unable to see any sign of Tiffany.

"So where's you're pokemon?" Joe asks. You look around nervously, "hope this works" you think and you give off a high pitched whistle. You heard the sound of trees falling and you turn to see Tiffany racing through the woods towards you before stopping right behind you, you turned back to Joe who was standing there frozen. "Joe meet my pokemon Tiffany, you can just ya know give me the money and badge right now if you'd like" you say.

Joe shakes himself out of the reverie he was in "screw that let's do this, go bellosom" he yells throwing a pokeball. Out pops a belossom anthro who stares up at Tiffany and looks likes she's going to piss herself, you can't help but laugh and the bellossom stares at you angrily and seems ready to fight. Tiffany steps over you and stares down the bellossom who backs up a bit.

"Ready to begin?" you ask.

"Yep" Joe replies, "bellossom use solar beam" he yells and you see the bellossom glow for a second before firing off a beam from it's head. This suprised you as you remember solar beam taking a while to charge. It hits Tiffany square in the chest and actually pushes her back a bit and leaving some singed feathers. Tiffany stares down angrily at the belossom and pulls her head back and you see flame lick at the edge of her beak. "Stop" you yell and Tiffany keeps her head up and the flame dies down, she looks down quizzivally at you. "Tiffany if you use an attack like that you might kill the other pokemon, that and you'll set the whole forest on fire. Joe seems to wait for you as you did kind of just save his pokemon. "So what should I do then?" she asks.

"I don't know pin it, if it can't get up and use an attack then it can't win right?" you say. Tiffany lowers herself and pins the belossom under one finger, it struggles for a bit but can't get back up. "Bellossom use" "I wouldn't do that if I were you" you say. Joe looks at you confused, "look Tiffany has the potential to kill you're pokemon, you hear me, kill you're pokemon not knock it out, wipe it from this earth, so please don't make her injure it and just concede this round" you say. Joe stares at you and the bellossom looks up at Joe sadly, "fine, you win" he says, "bellossom return" he says calling her back. The rest of the battle follows this fashion, Tiffany quickly pins a bellsprout girl with another finger and then pins a regular venasuar with her palm. Joe sighs once he calls back his venasuar, "that's some pokemon you got there" he says smiling.

Tiffany smiles down at you, "did we win?" she asks.

"Yep, great job Tiffany" you say. Tiffany lifts you up in her palm and taps her beak, "come on, since I won" she says happily. You lean over and kiss her beak and she smiles before putting you down. You walk up to Joe who hands you $2000 and a light badge which like the name suggests look like an 8 sided star of light. You smile and he sighs, "never in my career as a gym leader have I been beaten so badly" he says laughing a bit.

"Well it's not like you really had much of a chance" you say patting Tiffany's leg. Joe looks at you, "wish I had a chance for a rematch, once I got stronger" he says.

"Hey maybe I can come back once i've beaten the rest of the gym leaders, it won't take that long if all the matches are like this" you say smiling.

"No Matt I want to travel with you and Tiffany, it would be pretty fun, besides I think my bellossom still has something to say to you" Joe says and you actually did notice the belossom's pokeball was continually shaking. Joe holds the ball out and her bellossom comes out, it walks straight up to you and looks at you eye to eye, you try to move back but you were stuck against Tiffany's leg. It smiles at you and runs a finger down you're chest, "hey Joe what's up with you're pokemon" you say.

"Aww she likes you, isn't that nice" he says.

"Good for her" you reply as the bellossom snuggles up against you laying her head on you're chest, "so call her back already" you say.

"Nah, this is too much fun" Joe replies. You were pulled back and Tiffany stared at the bellossom and stuck her tongue out at her before snuggling you up against her cheek. "Matt i'm the only pokemon for you right?" Tiffany asks looking at you.

"Well I wouldn't mind having a few more pokemon just in case you are ever defeated" you say. Tiffany stares at you slightly angry, "so maybe you should go with that belossom" she says dropping you on the ground although she did lower her hand so you weren't hurt and she turns around in a huff. You stare up at Tiffany shocked and Joe's bellossom runs up and hugs you, looking you over for any bruises or scratches, you stand up but she just pushes you over. You look over and Joe was literally on the ground rolling from side to side laughing. The bellossom moves forward over you're body and you're body won't respond, you've fantasized for this kind of thing to happen so many times and now it was. The belossom smiles at you and giggled a bit before lowering down to kiss her and she was yanked up. You saw Tiffany stare at her angrily, and even though she was a bird, she was growling at the belossom. Joe stands up, and holds up a pokeball and belossom is recalled. Joe smiles at you and throws you the pokeball, "here, she seems to like you better then me, besides i've got another one" Joe says pulling another pokeball out of a backpack. You tentativley strap the pokeball to you're belt and say "welcome to the team Trixie."

Tiffany glares at you, "you've already got a name for her?" she says angrily.

"Yeah, I was gonna call you Angela but you already had a name" you say smiling. Tiffany sighs and picks you up, "fine she can come, but you better remember who loves you" Tiffany says gently kissing you and rubbing you against her cheek. You smile up at her and return the kiss, "I know beautiful" you say stroking her feathers.
1541211.title: Head for New light city the first gym

15412111.content:
You looked at Joe and he smiles "want to head to the next town?" he asks.

"Not today, I mean what are people going to think of the mighty gym leaders if I beat you all in less than a week" you reply. Tiffany taps you on the shoulder "ok, we beat you all in less than a week" you say. Joe laughs, "yeah that'd be pretty sad, although I think a giant blaziken is enough justification" he says.

"What's wrong with a giant blaziken?" Tiffany says.

"Nothing, nothing, it's just the fact that your bigger then Groudon or Kyogre, kind of gives you an advantage" Joe says. Tiffany nods, "well I must admit, there aren't very pokemon as big as I am" she says sitting down and putting you in her lap.

"Aren't many, Tiffany your the only 1000ft tall pokemon i've ever heard of" you reply. She looks down at you, "is that a problem?" she asks.

"Of course not, but it makes me wonder if our journey might make a few rules" you say starting to think.

"New rules?" Tiffany asks.

"Yeah you know height restrictions, weight restrictions, no legendaries, that kind of thing" you reply. Tiffany looks down at you, "well it doesn't matter if they don't let us finish as long as I’m with you" she says. You pet her stomach and get comfy in the feathers, "I have to agree Tiffany, although I’d like to win, I mean we already beat Joe, would be kind of bad if he were the only gym leader we beat" you say.

"Hey, are you calling me weak?" Joe yells.

"No, No, I mean anyone would lose to Tiffany" you say. You felt Trixie's poke ball start shaking so you put it down, and she pops out. Trixie smiles at you before hugging you. You moved her back a bit and finally had a chance to get a look at her. Trixie was quite beautiful, she was slimmer then Tiffany although she had a smaller chest probably a pair of b's in exchange for it. Her body was only covered by the grass dress all bellossom wear as well as a crude bra that seemed to be made of giant yellow flower petals although you have no idea where she found them. Trixie stares at Tiffany then at you "why are you pushing me away?" she asks. You didn't answer for a few seconds so she pressed on "am I not pretty enough? Are my breasts too small? Is it because I lost to her" she says pointing at Tiffany. By the end of her tirade Trixie had gotten herself so worked up she was almost crying, you looked at her stunned I mean you had 2 beautiful pokemon who seemed to really like you. Much to your suprise Tiffany pushes you and Trixie closer to each other, Trixie looks up for a second and sniffles before hugging you tightly pressing her chest against you. You slowly wrapped your arms around her and hugged her back and you felt her kiss your cheek and then just hug you tightly for a few seconds. Finally she lets go and smiles at you "um....what do you think of me?" she asks.

"Well you look very beautiful Trixie, i'm really glad to have you as my pokemon" you say. Trixie's smile turns into a big goofy grin and you swear you smelt something for a second. Soon your mind clouded "oh crap sweet scent" you think before falling forward into Trixie's lap. The dress was quite smooth as were her legs, Trixie giggled for a second and started to pet your head "thanks cutie, I like you too" she says.

"What did you do to him" Tiffany says lowering her head and examining you.

"Nothing just used sweet scent, thought I could well seduce him but seems it has a much stronger effect on people then I expected" Trixie says. Tiffany gently picks you up and turns you over so your facing her, "don't worry we won't do anything, but you do look really cute all helpless like this" she says. Your able to raise your eyebrows at her and she lowers you down "is there a way to fix this, like quickly?" Tiffany asks.

"I've got it" Joe yells, Tiffany and Trixie just stare at him as they had been totally obsessed with you. You couldn't see but you heard Joe walk up and search through a bag before you felt something get sprayed on your neck. You felt the feeling return to your arms and limbs and you sat up "thanks" you say smiling.

"No problem" he says giving you a hand up. You looked up and the sky had darkened a lot in the past half hour, "well let's set up camp" you say. Trixie and Joe helped you collect twigs and branches and Tiffany made a little pit in the ground. You piled up all the sticks in the pit and Tiffany blew a tiny flame onto the pile which soon ignited. Joe pulls a rolled up sleeping bag out of his backpack and lays down next to the fire, you return Trixie to her pokeball although she pecked you on the cheek before she was returned. Tiffany laid down and Joe yelled over "hey where's your sleeping bag?"

"Right here" you reply as Tiffany picks you up and snuggles you into her chest. You couldn't see Joe but you were sure he was probably green with envy (hehe somewhat pun). You felt Tiffany start to gently pet your back and you rubbed her feathers in return. You fell asleep like that mumbling "I love you Tiffany." You were woken up by gentle shaking and you opened your eyes to see Joe standing above you and a clear blue sky. "Damn man, this is the best bed i've ever seen" he says as you smile up at him.

"Yep, companion, battle partner, and a really comfy bed" you say. You felt Tiffany stir as apparently she had still been asleep and Joe jumps off before you fell to the ground as she sits up, yawns, and stretches. She looks down and smiles at you "morning" she says sleepily.

"Morning" you reply, Tiffany in her half asleep picks you up and just smiles at you for a bit before lifting you up and kissing you. You were suprised as her tongue pushed against you and it was almost like she wanted to taste you for a second before she pushed against you as you weren't returning the kiss. You kissed her beak and you were sure a smile spread across her face, she broke the kiss after a few seconds and just gently rubbed you against her cheek. "My cute little trainer" she whispered before kissing you again quickly. Tiffany puts you down and Trixie's pokeball was shaking like mad before she popped out and tackled you "morning" she says before kissing you on the lips. You were too stunned to do anything for a few seconds but you eventually kissed her back and she stood up, and was returned to her pokeball. Joe looks at you and sighs "damn man what the hell, why are you getting all the love?" he says.

You shrug "just really lucky I guess" you reply.

"So what gym do we go to next" you say.

"Well I think Glacial city up north would be best although it's a few days travel" Joe says.

"What about Twilight town, doesn't that place have a gym?" you ask.

"Yeah but it's not as good a matchup for your pokemon" Joe says looking at Tiffany. She lowered herself and smiled at him "thank you for the concern but I think we can handle whatever the gym leader can throw at us, it's not like you were much of a challenge" she says. Joe just stares at her stunned and you laughed your ass off.

154121112.content:
"I think we should head to Twilight Town, I mean the gym leader is a dark type user, besides that it's closer. Also how would it look if given Tiffany's size we took on 2 gyms where she had a type advantage one after the other, probably wouldn't look like I had much faith in her" you say after you stopped laughing.

"So then why was I the first gym leader you chose?" Joe asks.

"Well actually, that was the first battle I've ever fought, even with Tiffany's size I still wanted the type advantage" you say. Joe smiles but rolls his eyes "well glad I could give you such an exhilerating battle" he says sarcastically.

"What can I say man, Tiffany is just a very strong pokemon" you say.

Joe just smiles that is until Tiffany picks you up and puts you on her shoulder and just starts walking "hey what about me?" he shouts. Tiffany turns and looks down at him, "you can walk" she says, you tap her shoulder and she sighs "fine" she says. She picks Joe up and puts him on her other shoulder before starting to walk again. Tiffany walks for an hour before stopping to have a small rest, Joe walks off because he needs to do some buisness and Tiffany sits down and you look up at her"why'd you do that?" you ask her.

"Do what?" she asks.

"Ignore Joe and try to leave him behind" you say. Tiffany stares down at you for a second then lifts you up "Because, I just met you, and already there's someone else vying for your affections, and all you'll do is spend time with him instead of me" she says. You were kind of shocked, I mean you had just met Joe like yesterday it wasn't like you were best buddies. You sigh and look up at Tiffany, "Tiffany I will never ignore you, got that, no matter how many people or pokemon I make friends with you will always be my first and well, I love my big beautiful blaziken" you say. Tiffany cuddles you against her cheek and puts you down right as Joe walks up, "so can we get going?" he asks.

"Sure, fine by me" you say climbing up and sitting down on Tiffany's shoulder. She lifts Joe up and puts him down then slowly stands up. The rest of the walk to Twilight Town was pretty eventful, you just had a lot of idle chitchat. "So Joe, do you know anything about the Twilight Gym leader?" you ask.

"She's a woman by the name of Ralena, she goes everywhere with an anthro umbreon who is her best friend, although since it's a guy there have been a few....rumours about her and her pokemon" Joe replies. You nod as you had heard a few of the rumours he was talking about.

"Why would there be rumours?" Tiffany asks.

"Some people, think anthro pokemon should be classified with animals, so they think it's wrong if we see them as anything more than pets" Joe replies. Tiffany just shakes her head "so they think it's wrong that I love my little trainer" she says leaning her head over so you can pet her feathery cheek.

"Yeah pretty much" Joe replies.

"Do you have a problem with it?" Tiffany says stopping and staring at Joe.

"No, of course not, I mean I love my pokemon as much as any trainer and I want them to love me back" Joe says. Tiffany stares at him for a few seconds before nodding and continuing to walk. You just sat back against Tiff's neck and gently stroked what you could of her cheek trying to calm her down. Finally she stopped and looked back at Joe, "I'm sorry for what I said, it's just I don't want anyone threatening my little trainer" she says. Joe nods quickly "that's pervfectly understandable, he probably doesn't want anything to happen to you either" he says. A few minutes later you reach the outskirts of Twilight Town, Joe decided to stay with Tiffany to try to get her to warm up a bit with him and you headed into town. Unlike New Light City, Twilight Town was a very small place, set in a small valley it got dark there very quickly and the city was known for the colorful displays of lights people kept on their houses all year round.

You headed off for the gym as like New Light City it was easily recognizable, however unlike in New Light City there was a whole hell of people waiting in front of the black Crescent moon shaped building that surrounded the actual battlefield. Most people used Twilight Town as there second or last gym battle, so it was a lot more busy than New Light City, although since it was only trainers that ever came Twilight Town was able to stay relatively small. The line into the gym however was in no way small, given that an average pokemon battle could take about half an hour and even longer and there were atleast 30 people standing in the line you just turned around and walked out of town and back to where Joe and Tiffany were waiting.

"Well?" Tiffany asks.

"We're going to have to wait until tomorrow, the gym's way too busy" you say. Tiffany starts to stand up "oh come on, I'm sure once they see me they'll clear right out" she says.

"Yeah they probably will, but Tiffany I don't want to just skip the queue, we're going to wait our turn, and that's final" you say. She sits back down making you bounce an inch in the air "fine, spoil all my fun" she says.

"Tiffany I don't want anyone to see you as a monster, I want them to see the beautiful and caring Blaziken I see" you say. Tiffany instantly breaks into a smile and lifts you into her lap "Fine Matt we can wait" she says. Joe climbs up into Tiffany's lap and lays back "hey this is really comfy" he says. Tiffany picks him up between two fingers "ah hem, Joe remember what I said about personal space" she says.

"Oh that's part of it?" Joe asks.

"Yes, you may sit on my outer extremities but the inner parts of my body are Matt only areas" she states.

"Due I am so envious of you" he yells down at you.

"Uh...thanks Joe" you say and Tiffany puts Joe down on the ground. He sighs and lays back against her leg and starts rooting around in a backpack before pulling out a book and he starts to read. Tiffany however wasn't finished with you, she lifts you up onto the top of her head just gives you a little pat, you can either take a nap or pet me, your choice" she says. Obviously you got straight to work stroking her head, Tiffany gave off a small sigh and started to recline a bit laying against a large group of trees that suprisingly held her weight up. Tiffany was actually the first one to doze off thanks to the summer heat, you got off her head and slid down to the ground where you found Joe on the ground and you dragged his body over to a nearby tree so there was no chance of Tiffany hurting him when she woke up. You walked back up Tiffany and lay down on her stomach. Suddenly Trixie's pokeball started to shake and she popped out, she took a second to look around and figured out everyone else was asleep. Before you could react she was attached to you and she laid her head down on your shoulder. After a few seconds you heard her breathing space out, you gave off a small happy sigh and gently hugged the bellossom and fell asleep like that. You woke up to...

"Jeez, Didn't think I would get lost so easily" You think to yourself after your 3rd hour of wandering though the forest. Sighing, you come up to a creek an sit down at the bank. Staring at your reflection in the crystal clear water, you reflect on the reason you are out here lost.
It all started about 14 years ago, back when you were only 5 years old. So long as you can remember you had always been raised by a group of wild pokemon, and you had always treated them as family. opening your right hand you look down at the black scar in the shape of a flame. "yes its all because of this." clenching your fisht you force yourself to remember. When you were young there was a Ninetails in the valley you lived in, and he did not like humans at all, having been betryaed by his old trainer. to say the least he did not like you being in the valley so one day he decided to try and get rid of you. There is an old saying that, anyone who pulls on a ninetails tail will be cursed. Well thats just what happens, he tricked you into pulling one of them, leaving this mark emblazoned on your hand. Because of this the pokemon exiled the ninetails and you had to live with the curse. The curse itself will cause a searing pain to overtake the cursed's body about once a day, and lasts 5 minutes to an hour. Suddenly you feel the searing pain start up, but it doesn't feel like the normal daily pain, more like... The Curse mark flared red and lines began appearing all over your body. 'Not Now, Not Here' you think to your self. just then the line burst open and blood shoots everywhere. 'Yeah definetally the monthly burst' you think as you begin to black out from blood loss.

Matt was searching the grassy fields, he had wanted a pokemon for his own. But he didn't want jujst any pokemon, he wanted one who was big, and not just tall, he wanted her huge, to the point where he would be up to her knee and more. Which is the main reason he learned how to perform magical spells, and he learned enough to set out and find the right pokegirl, one who would enjoy being big, yet still gentle at the same time. He was daydreaming a bit too much, becasue he stepped on something and felt a sudden electric shock, not enough to do any damage, but enough to knock him out.

When Matt finally woke up, his vision was bit blurry. He stood up and tried to clear his head

"Are you alright?" came a soft sounding voice, Matt looked over to see a beautiful Luxio anthro pokemon, Matt couldn't help but stare at this beautiful creature "Are you still a bit dazed?" she asked, Matt shook his head lightly

"No, I'm alright" Matt said, hearing the worry in her voice

"I'm sorry for shocking you, you stepped on my tail and I thought something was coming to pick on me again" She said, sounding a bit sorry

"Pick on you? why would they do that?" Matt asked, wondering why someone would pick on such a cute girl

"Because....no, you'll just tease me too...." She said. Matt felt sorry for her and moved towards her

"I'd never bring myself to tease something as cute as you" He said in a comforting voice, this made her look a little shocked and blushed lightly

"Y-You think I'm cute?" She stuttered out, Matt softly nodded. She imediatly wrapped her arms around him, he could hear her purring, Matt smiled and hugged back. They held eachother this way for a while until Matt slowly broke it

"My name is Matt by the way" he finally introduced himself

"I'm Ele" She said smiling "And I feel like maybe I can trust you, I don't know why but I feel comfortable, I'm picked on frequently, becasue others find it fun to pick on what I often dream about"

"And what is that?" Matt asled curiously

"I, uh...I want to be big" She said heasitantly.

"Excuse me?" matt said in disbelief

"I-I know its dumb sounding..." Ele started

"I don't think it is" Matt said

"Huh?!" Ele sounded shocked

"I actually wanted a girl who was big" Matt explained

"Oh wow" She said lightly "Just...how big?"

"Big! very big! I mean giantess!" Matt exclaimed, Ele once again hugged him tightly, holding it again for a while

"Will you....be my trainer then?" Ele asked whiled they hugged

"I would be glad to" Matt said back as they broke their second hug "And I happen to know some magic" He said finding his backpack and pulling out a small book

"Ooh!" Ele said in interest

"So, I can easily make you big" Matt said smiling

"Do it!" She shouted excitedly.

"How can I..." Ele started, but cut off when she started to feel a small surge of warmth go through her, she then started to slowly grow. She looked to be around 6 feet at first, but she soon was 7, then 8, then 10. "I...I'm growing!" She said excitedly

1543322121211122.content:
Matt fingered through his book; looking for the spell he wanted. Ele was a nice girl, nicer than he had honestly expected someone at her new size to be after growth; as such, he wanted to give her the answer to a dream that she'd thought impossible until now. He finally found it and grinned as the glow reappeared around his hand; he'd grant her this wish, and then some. He tapped the Luxio's ankle, making her giggle slightly as the warmth slowly spread over her again. She grew; 55, 60, 75, 100 feet tall. It was here that Ele had expected to stop, but she kept right on going; here yellow eyes widened as she looked down to the human that was now resting atop one of her growing feet. Matt just smiled and waved up at her; signalling that this was no mistake. And Ele smiled back as she climbed, ever further, into the triple digits.

Trees shrank under her and were pushed aside as he feet expanded with the rest of her massive form, her weight put huge dents into the ground in the shape of her plantigrade feet, her purring could be heard throughout the forest as she kept going. Finally, once her height had reached 200 feet, the spell released her and she could fully appreciate her surroundings. The trees were like thick grass to her; mountains, once incredible monuments of nature, were now little more than hills to her; she was easily the strongest Pokémon in the forest, in her forest.

And it was all thanks to the boy that was sliding off her foot.

"Oh Matt." She spoke, her voice holding such power now that it actually took him by surprise. "Thank you; thank you so much."

The boy smiled up, tipping an imaginary hat to the massive Luxio. "No trouble at all." He said, the grin just growing as he spoke. "It's always a pleasure to help one so beautiful as you." Ele blushed at the compliment and Matt chuckled at how someone like him could make this goddess blush; even if it was a goddess he'd created. "So; what are you going to do with your new size?"

Ele blinked, then put a hand to her chin in thought. Her tail swayed lazily as she closed her eyes to concentrate on figuring out the answer to the human's question. "Well..." She started; grinning down at Matt. "I suppose I could...

1543322122111.content:
"June?" Matt called out, glancing through the door into the kitchen. Where was she? It wasn't like her to not come when called.

June was an anthropomorphic Growlithe. Specifically, she was Matt's Growlithe, and his companion. They lived together in Matt's cabin, in the forests around Mt. Flare. Whenever Matt went out for any reason, whether to go to town for supplies or just on a walk, June would follow, zealously protecting her beloved master. When Matt went to bed, June would snuggle up against him underneath the covers. And whenever Matt showed the slightest sign of needing any kind of assistance, June would be at his side, instantly.
Except she wasn't right now.

"June, where are you? I'm starting to get worried here-" Matt stopped mid-sentence as he peeked around the attic. There, in a corner filled with dusty boxes, June crouched on the floor. "June? Are you okay?"
June jumped to her feet at the sound of Matt's voice, clearly surprised.
"M-m-matt! I'm so sorry! I didn't hear you! I was careless, I'm sorry!"
"It's okay, June, I don't mind. I was just getting worried. It's not like you to get distracted."
"It won't ever happen again, I promise!"
"Don't worry about it. What was so interesting, anyway?" June didn't answer. She just shifted her hands around behind her back. Matt suddenly noticed a thin wisp of steam rising from two small trails of water on her cheeks. "June? Have you been crying?"
June quickly rubbed her eyes with one hand, being sure to keep the other hand behind her back. "No! Of course not! Why would I be crying?"
"I don't know, but whatever it is, I don't like it." Matt stepped closer. To his surprise, June stepped back.
"It's nothing, Matt, just forget about it."
Matt frowned. He hated to see June crying like this. "No. June, I order you to give me whatever it is you're hiding."
June gasped, but she would never disobey a direct order from Matt. She slowly moved her hand forward, revealing an old photograph. Matt took it from her and looked at it.

There were five Growlithe girls standing together, all of varying sizes. If the tree and house in the background were any indication, the biggest of the girls, who had to crouch to fit in the image, was easily over thirty feet tall- large even for a Pokegirl.
"P-please, don't make fun of me, Matt..."
"Why would I make fun of you? June, what's this a photo of? Is this your family?"
"Yes. It's my sisters and me."
"I thought so. You've all got the same eyes. Is this one you?" June looked at the girl Matt was pointing to, and broke into tears again. "June! What's wrong?! Did I say something?"
"N-no, it's just..."
Matt walked up to June and placed his hands on her shoulders. June was taller than he was, about eight feet from paws to ears, but Matt certainly didn't mind.
"June... just talk to me. Please?"
June bit her lip for a moment, then sighed.

"Yes. That one is me. I'm the runt of the litter."
"What?"
"I'm the runt. I'm just a scrawny little thing." Matt looked down at the photo. Now that she mentioned it, June was the smallest girl in the photo. Her closest competition was at least ten feet tall, probably a little more. "I'm sorry I kept it hidden from you, but I didn't want to make you feel bad."
"Why would I feel bad?"
"Because my sisters are all huge, and strong, and powerful, and you just got me, little old June, the runt!"
June began to cry again.
"June, I-"
"I always wanted to be big like my sisters, so I could take care of you and protect you like they protect their masters, but I can't! I'm useless!"
"Don't be silly! You're not useless at all!"
"But I'm still just the runt!"

Matt bit his lip. It was true that he had always wished June could be bigger. He loved her just the way she was, of course, loved her absolutely- but even then, if she was bigger... if she was huge, gigantic, tremendous...
Matt shook himself out of it. No use putting thoughts like that into his head.
He threw the photo off into the corner, walked up to June, and hugged her tight. He sank into her soft furry body, gently pressing against her large breasts.
"I wouldn't care if you were one foot or one hundred feet- you're my Growlithe, June, and I love you."
"T-thank you, Matt... Thank you..."
"Now come on, let's go get something to eat. Wipe those tears away."
June smiled and did as her master asked.
1543322122111.title: June

As Matt and June sat down at the table to eat, Matt couldn't help but remember the photo. If June had been thirty feet tall...
No! He had to stop thinking like that! He'd just end up making June feel bad, and that was the last thing in the world he wanted to do. She was the kindest, gentlest, most loving Pokegirl he had ever met or even heard of.
Still...

"Mount Flare looks lovely when the sun sets behind it, doesn't it?"
"Huh? Oh, yeah." Matt glanced out the window. As he stared, a thought suddenly came to him- something crazy, but crazy enough that it just might work! "June, what you said upstairs..."
June looked away, ready to cry again at any moment.
"Forget what I said, Matt, please. I was just so... surprised, that's all. I didn't mean anything."
"Really? So you'd turn down a chance to get bigger?"
"Of course not! I-I mean... d-don't be silly! How could I get bigger?"
Matt smiled at Mt. Flare. "You have the Flash Fire ability, don't you?"
"Yes, but... but..." June slowly turned to look at Mt. Flare as well.
"And Mt. Flare is a volcano, isn't it?"
"It's inactive, though!" June was visibly excited, even though she was trying to convince herself that what she was thinking would never work.
"That doesn't mean there isn't any lava in it, just that it isn't going to explode. If someone who could absorb heat energy was able to absorb even a fraction of that lava... or maybe a lot..."
"Or maybe all!" June shouted. No sooner had the words left her muzzle, though, than she seemed to regret her outburst. "I mean, maybe just a bit, not too much..."
Matt placed a hand atop one of June's paws. "I don't see why it couldn't be all of it- as long as that person was comfortable with it."
"I'm sure this person wouldn't want to scare her master by growing too big..."
"That's only an issue if said master actually thinks there is such a thing as 'too big.'"
June's tail whipped frantically back and forth, like a metronome caught in a blender. "Well...

Matt could tell that June was trying her hardest not to get too excited over the prospect of growing to sizes beyond anything that she'd ever dreamed, but her tail was her tell. Not that he minded in the least, he had made the suggestion for the sole purpose of making her happy; plus, seeing her even big appealed to him as much as it did to her. "We're not going to find out just sitting here, now are we?" He said, getting the Pokégirl's attention again as he stood up. "Shall we?"

June was on her feet almost before he'd even finished, eyes shining with the same eagerness that he'd always loved about her. "Yes, Matt." She said, tail wagging as she spoke. "Let's go!" Matt chuckled to himself as June bounced like a she was a puppy who'd just found out they were going for a walk, which they were in a way.

______________________________________________

The trip to Mt. Flare was surprisingly bland; still, Matt had come to expect it thanks to June being so protective of him. It took very little time to reach the volcano, and both master and Pokémon was anxious to see what would happen. Following one of the numerous tunnels down into the mountain, Matt and June eventually stumbled upon what looked to be a massive lake of magma; the human was sweating from the intense heat, but June was just excited over what was about to happen. "Ready?" Matt asked his Pokémon, like he didn't notice her barely held in excitement. "Go for it."

June ran to the edge of the lake and gingerly put a foot into the molten rock. As a Fire-type, it was just comfortably warm to her; but, more to the point, it seemed that they'd guessed right. Even Matt noticed that the small dip had increased her height by several feet. The Growlite squee'd in joy, before diving right into the lava and vanishing from Matt's sight. At first, he wasn't all that concerned, June could swim well enough and the magma was much denser than any water, but the seconds grew ever longer and his worry started to rear its head. "June?" He said, looking about to see if she had come up somewhere out of his sight. "June; where are you?" He repeated, slightly louder now as he looked around. Suddenly; the ground began to shake and Matt feared that his Pokémon had somehow awakened the volcano and it was about to erupt.

Well, he was half right; something was about to erupt.

June broke the surface of the lake, smiling down at her master as she towered over him. Back on the ground, Matt's jaw went slack as he stared up at the magnificent figure of his Pokémon. "Oh... my... God...."

June just giggled at this. "That's 'Goddess'." She corrected jokingly; as she now stood at an incredible height of...

1543322122112.content:
Matt yawned; coming home in the early morning from a long night at his work and more or less just sleep walking up the road to his large house. It was a long, boring and altogether dull walk to the large home; that was, until he was suddenly caught in the grip of something large, warm and furry and found himself rocketing upward. "Matt; you're home!" You were assaulted by a wet and warm surface that rubbed against you, leaving you wet but smiling nonetheless.

"Down, girl; Down!" You laughed out as you were set down once again; wiping away some of the wetness, the boy looked up at just what had put him through all that. It was an anthro Growlithe; not nearly that much of a surprise since they were so very common, what was unusual about her was her size. The Growlithe, whom you had nicknamed Katie, was just over 300 feet tall. Matt had become famous for managing to capture her, a one of a kind titan that science was still scratching its head over; no one seemed to know how a Pokémon could get as big as her and Katie just giggled and smiled whenever someone asked her directly. But Matt had stopped caring a long time ago; he had always liked big girls, so he didn't care about the how or why as long as she was the size she was. As an added bonus, he was getting regular challenges to try and best her in a fight; since he'd never lost a match since catching her, he was filthy rich. He'd splurged and bought what amounted to a mansion(that barely reached Katie's ankle) to live in with her as his guard.

Which brings us back to the here and now; even though he was set for life-literally-with Katie around, he still liked to work so he didn't get lazy or complacent. However, now that he was home with his girl, everything just seemed right with the world. But this would turn out to be an interesting day for Matt; in ways that he couldn't foresee.

What's going to happen today?

1543322122122.content:
His hand reached up to wipe the sweat from his brow; Matt had lost count of how many days that he'd been wondering in these woods. It wasn't that he was lost, he could easily find his way back to the last town with a few days walk; he was out here because of sheer stubbornness. This area wasn't your average forest, it appeared in countless legends told by travelers; legends that told of a goddess that watched over the entire forest by herself. There was a fair amount of variety in the accounts; but, there had been enough consistency to convince Matt that there was a core element of truth to them all. As such, he'd taken it upon himself to travel these woods for days upon days upon days until he could find her and meet her for himself.

He reviewed the stories in his mind, going over the common details; what little he'd managed to find in the stories. The goddess was always referred to as an Arcanine; she was almost always recognizable at first sight; and the most common of all: She was always significantly bigger than the rare wild Arcanine that could be found within these woods. It wasn't very much to go on, not enough to get the attention of a reputable scientist at the very least, but Matt had decided that the sheer number of accounts with these three things in common trumped the lack of more similarities.

Suddenly, he felt a light thudding that vibrated through the ground.

Matt jumped to his feet, afraid that he was about to get caught in an earthquake, before he remembered that this entire area was geologically stable; this was something else entirely. The vibration came again, slightly more forceful this time; then again with yet more force. It continued one like this for several moments before Matt realized that was a very regular pattern to the vibrations; almost like they were.... footsteps.

"Well; whose this cutie I find walking in my woods?"

Matt turned, finding himself staring up at a...

Your name is Matt, a researcher and inventor, one who has made quite a grand impact on the world, as such you are quite rich. You lived in quite the spacious house with the nice interior and everything, you were a bit modest, so it wasn't extravagant or anything, but still very comfortable for a few families to live in.

You were sitting at your computer desk, doing whatever you were doing at the moment, lost in the moment, rather bored and daydreaming a bit. Just when you began to wonder where she was, you felt a pair of arms wrap around you from behind, you smile as you immediately recognize who it is, you smile.

"Hello Jill" You say to your Mightyena companion

"Good afternoon, Master" She said in her usual, sexy tone.

Jill has been with you for years, since she was just a poochyena, once she evolved, she became quite the looker, a slim and curvy build that showed a hint of training and exercise, black hair that she kept short and scruffy, you liked it, it made her look more wild. and of course, a large, bountiful, melon sized bust.

"Hows m big girl doing?" You ask, grinning to yourself as you feel the arms around you cover a bit more as Jill gained a foot to her already 7 foot body.

The invention you made became known an coveted almost as soon as it went public, you invented a type of nanite, a special kind what can alter the bodies of pokemon, they were voice commanded to the trainer. Whatever type of body change the said, it would occur, such as growth, strength increase, speed increase, etc. These became highly popular since it made battles an even greater spectacle. Not to mention, it helped fulfill many fantasies (Including your own). However, you knew better than to send the best out, the junk you pushed to the public had limitations, and were only temporary, you saved the best for yourself, the ones inside Jill lasted, and there was no limit, Jill could be as fast or as strong as any legendary, and beyond, and best of all, she could grow to be a goddess, all at the command of your voice.

She spun you from your computer, facing her now, you never did object to her decision of being naked while in the house "I'm doing just fine, but you look a little uncomfortable in that chair. why not have a seat on something a little more comfy?" She asked, her usual, feral smile.

You chuckle to yourself, playing along "Are you suggesting I use you? Why, you'd have to grow to fifteen feet to do something like that." You say, as soon as you do, Jill closed her eyes, smiling and running her hand down her hip as she grew bigger, stretching upwards until she did indeed hit 15 feet. Another reason for spacious living, it gave her plenty of room to "stretch". She opened her eyes and looked at you as she sat down with her legs crossed, nothing turned you on more than watching your girl get big, you get out of your seat in exchange to sit in her lap, feeling her warm, soft fur as you cuddle up against her. smiling sweetly, you feel her hand petting you.

"It's so nice to see my little Master enjoy a nice warm lap" Jill says as she pets

"I love it when you're big, love" you say to her, leaning on her,feeling her body add another foot, you nuzzle her soft belly fur. You begin to wonder if you should offer her, you've been thinking of a fun game of sorts, and if it went right, it would mean her getting to skyscraper sized heights, or you could have your usual rounds of her growing.

154332212222112.content:
You're Matt and 19 years old. You're a human that lived a relative normal live in an orphanage. Ok how would one define normal? Everyone does it in their own way, so that doesn't help. A quick summary of important things is you never new your parents, the orphanage staff has taken care of you and other very well and you were well educated, even if the teachers were rather set on getting you all well disiplined. Everything seemed like it had always been this way and would stay like it which sounds like the most cliché shit, but you can't change your past life now, can you? When you were 12 or so the orphanage burnt down, not thanks to an accident or pyromanic teenagers, but accidentaly by teenagers who were fighting with their pyromanic Pokémon. Surprisingly no one got hurt, but thing were off for a while, since where you come from Pokémon are believed to be fiction and even the staff members were at a loss for a bit. Though after a while the orphanage was rebuild and things returned to some kind of normality.

The only new things were the new Anthro Septile caretaker and a Simsala math teacher to help you and the other kids get used to the new enviorment. Everything went well until you turned 18. Back then you weren't told somethings for example people had to venture out and latest at eighteen years. It was normal for the people here as they normally recieved a Pokémon at the age of 10, but due to your... circumstances you didn't have one so you had to get your Pokémon on your own in the wilderness. Sounds still pretty easy, right?

Well it is, if you get some Pokèballs escape the regular wildlife,some more wild and brutal Pokèmon and the average Trainer trying to mug you with his team at your throat. The only thing left then is finding food and shelter. Shelter was the smaller problem as anything in the wilderness seemed to leave you alone for some reason. Food, however proved to be diffecult to get as stores are more than overpriced, while work hwas hardly paid at all, when you didn't provide for a Pokémon. The fruits and berries found in the wild are mostly poisoness for humans, so you had to hunt small rodents and catch normal fish just to survive.

The only good thing is that die to your desperate lifestyle some low-rank members of Team Rocket noticed you and got you a place in the organisation. Your part since then was to scout out certain locations for their heists or other plan by taking a part-time job there and getting keys or other necessary items. Though they didn't give you a Pokémon, since they had mostly stolen ones and those aren't really obedient. But after the first few Jobs you learned it was mostly to allow you the easy access to the jobs as the paperwork normal Trainers have to fill out was rediculous. There also was no way to get around it as basicly everyone is able to look up who has which Pokémon, since every new pokeball is chipped and automaticly registers to a personal ID. At least your getting a good payment for the scouting and the actual job your doing. Though that should be a given as you also had to play hostage a few times to bust your teammates out of sticky situations. Good thing you earned some promotions for that.

Now the bad part that about it in The present day. Your suppose to move north and work with their newly built facility. Just to get there you need to geht over these Mountains. Snowy Mountains. Without a road. Or food, water, warm clothing or pretty much anything. These guys didn't even give you a guide or a group to travel with! What shitty... Whatever. Now you're at the mercy of nature and it doesn't like you. The snowfall bot stringer in the last few hours and all you can see is white with some grey stone that you almost trip over, since your unable to see further than a few feet in front of you. Right now you're resting in a small cave near a little fire you made. It won't last much longer judging by the flame and how few firewood, but for now it is warm atleast. From time to time you look up, out into the endless white of the slowly calming storm.

It is while doing this, you see a figure mode outside the cave. It isn't exactly the worst option bring torn to pieces by something, when compared to freezing to death or starvation. You get up and slowly approach the figure outside the cave. As you get closer it gets clear to you, standing there is an Anthro Pokémon. A female Absol to be exact. Given ALL Pokémon are female, which makes one wonder how they reproduce, but ehh... Who cares? She is a little shorter than you, maybe by an inch or so. For some reason though she doesn't react to your approach and you stop a few feet away froh her, befor you call out to her.

"Hey, you!" The Absol jumps in surprise and spins around quickly. No wonder she didn't notice you. Thanks to the still rageing storm you hadn't even realized she had her back turned to you. You can still just barely make out her siliuett due to her white fur. Only her bloodred eyes pierce the show and let you know where her face is. You have to admit that she does have beautyful eyes.

"A hu-human...!"she exclaims quite and definetly surprised."Ohh- Wh-who are y-you?" the Absol asks nervous. Atleast she doesn't rip you to pieces or something like that, but why is she so nervous? Afraid of you even, it seems.

"My Name is Matt. Mind telling me yours?" You awnser hoping to get this over fast, so you can get back to your fire soon.

"It's Angel...!" You like that name. It kind of fits her, but wasn't there something about Absols and disasters? What is that noise anyway?!

You turn around, noticing while doing so that Angel is also starring at something behind you, and look up. "Oh for fucks sake..." Is all you can say. Despite the snow you clearly see the giant avalanch that's starting above you. Quickly you reach out for Angel, which is about to start running down the rather steep side of the mountain your cave is embedded in, and get a hold of her arm. Instantly you pull her with you in the direction your cave was. The fire burnt down so far you could barely see it. A slight bit a head of the avalanch, both of you manage to get inside the cave, just to get catapulted to the other end by the force of a fraction of the snow that entered the cave. After a short flight the trip comes to an immediate stop, as you crash into the far end of the cave with head and back.

Your head hurts like hell and the feeling of something liquid like runnig down the back of your head is not helping either. Your head is also almost the only thing you can feel and your vision was already starting to get a bit blurry. But before you even realize exactly what happened, Angel lands right on top of you, the lips of you two locked in an instant. Despite being shocked you enjoy this little accident a lot, aswell as being a little closer to her. She's basicly a walking heater too you in this frozen hole. Also your getting a close look of her beautiful face. Her smooth and pretty soft dark blue skin, the small snout with her cute little nose and not to forget her wonderful mouth (which you feel, rather than see) or her race-defineing cresent-shaped horn, which goes off slightly on to the right side of her face.After another few seconds Angel seemed to recover from the impact too and slowly opened her eyes, which were even more intoxicating up close. Though then she suddenly realizes what happened, her eyes wide open she quickly gets oft you heavily blushing, despite her normal skin color overshadowing it partly, turning her head away.

"Ahh! I'm sorry - I didn't- It was- I mean...!" While Angel starteled, searches for a way to apologize, you slowly drift closer to a coma.

Though now you can also see her body as a whole, which appears to be very slender if qiuet curvy around the top. She has a cute, small butt, though it can in no way compete to her breasts. Some people call Pokémon 'Pocket Monsters' and those were definetly monsters! You're surprised, Angel can walk upright, even sprint with you to the cave, with each breast being the size of her torso. You knew Anthro Pokémon are always bigger and ...developed traits larger than average human females, but she definetly takes the cake!

"Don't worry so much about it. It's not like it hurt anyone, right?" You say in hope of calming her down, because everything is becoming a blurry mess.

"No, I guess not, but I didn't mean to-!" she starts again, thpough not stuttering this time.

"There is nothing to apologize for of to expain, okay? And of it helps, I must say, you're a great kisser." You state truthfully and there she blushes again. Then you feel yourself sliding over to your right side.

"Thank,...?!" You suddenly hit the ground hard, though you felt nothing. Your mind drifts away slowly as your surroundings fall silent. The last thing you see is a flame flickering in the wind, before just as it was fated to, turns to ashes.


Now, where is it that you awaken?

154332222211.content:
Matt looked down at the item he held, almost refusing to believe that he'd found it. After literally years of searching places with names he couldn't pronounce and spending what amounted to a small fortune on what everyone had told him was a fool's errand, he'd finally found it. "The Azure Flute." He spoke the name barely louder than a breath, as if he thought that speaking too loudly would cause the fabled artifact to shatter. "This... will summon Arceus." He spoke the words just a quietly, but there was a certain excitement to them this time. However, Matt was no glory hound seeking to capture or defeat the Alpha Pokémon; no, he merely wanted to meet her.

Matt had always been... 'interested' in strong Pokémon, and Arceus was supposed to be the strongest of them all; she was supposed to be the goddess of them all.

With shaking hands, he raised the Azure Flute to his lips and blew out a single, clear note. Even though his skill with the flute was moderate at the best, playing just that note on this instrument seemed like a song unto itself; a song that made even the best music written by any human composer pale in comparison. It was as if he was hearing just a glimpse of what Heaven was truly like in that one note channeled through this divine flute.

All of a sudden, the flute shattered in his grasp.

"NO!" Matt shouted as the fragments turned to dust; but, before he could say anything else, a flash of blinding light robbed him of his sight for several moments. When next he could see, he found himself in a landscape of pure white that seemed to stretch for as far as he could see in all directions; even stranger than that, the 'ground' beneath him seemed to be giving off it's own heat. "Wh-where am I?"

"Well; you summoned me, didn't you?" A powerful voice hailed from the heavens above and Matt turned his gaze skyward and gasped. Towering over him, and anything that he could possibly imagine, was Arceus herself. Her palm alone, which he appeared to be on, could have easily held his city and then some; her face filled his entire field of view even though he was only about at chest level; and he couldn't even begin to compare those to anything at all. "So; we going to try this fight thing, or would you rather just give up now." She said, sounding bored with the whole thing, like she'd done this enough times to know the routine.

"I- I-" Matt had to gulp to swallow his fear before he could continue. "I'm Matt." He finally said to her, trying to keep both his fear and his excitement contained. "N-nice to meet you."

Arceus raised an eyebrow. "'Meet' me?" She repeated. "Don't you mean 'fight' me or 'defeat' me?"

"No." Matt said, adamantly. "Meet you."
154332222211.title: A Goddess in More Than Just Name

choices: "What if we went to my place?"

Eventually, a grin began to crawl across her face. "Very well, 'Matt'. Nice to meet you too. Although I don't think I need any introductions, do I?"

Then, there was an akward silence. You'd think talking to something over a thousand times your size wouldn't allow for such moments, but apparently not. "...so, Arceus..." Matt said, in an attempt to break the silence, "Do you wanna...do something?"

The Arceus-girl cocked an eyebrow. "Like what?"

1543322222211221.content:
You had been lost in the forest for days, you're friends and family had told you not to go but you heard there were pokemon from all over the world in this forest and some you could only find there so you had to go. The forest was ancient with trees that dwarfed most you would normally see but that just made getting lost easier. You wandered around aimlessly, you were sure that you had left a trail when you had entered but it was almost like something or someone had removed it, wanting you to get lost. You stopped where you were and thought about the legends of the forest for a bit. Swarms of killer beedrill, pink versions of pokemon like rhydon, atleast half the pokemon were anthro, so far you had witnessed nearly every legend. "I know there was one more legend" you think as you start walking again. "Hmm now what was it.....oh yeah, wasn't there supposed to be a mightyena that guarded this forest, I know people have come here before, and that all of them have returned white as sheets just muttering the name under their breaths" you think. You foolishly keep walking until you don't feel anything under you're foot, you don't even cry out as you start to fall. You fall for a good 2 minutes until abruptly you're fall ends as you land on something that although somewhat hard still felt soft and you're knocked unconcious

You slowly regain conciousness and it's nightime, you wake up next to a giant bonfire big enough to cook multiple whole cows over and that freaks you out a bit. You look around quickly and you don't see anything except the outline of a small hill in the distance. You hear a girl sniffling "why do all these bad things have to happen to me, finally someone who seems to just like pokemon shows up and they're dead" you hear the girl say.

"Um hello?" you say, the sniffling stops and much to you're shock the outline of what you had taken to be a hill moves toward you. The shape enters the firelight and you stand there stunned as you're looking at a gigantic anthro Mightyena. Her black hair flowed down her back sparkling in the firelight. Her grey and black fur looked just as beautiful and also sparkled in the firelight, you figure you must have landed on her somewhere when you fell. You're attention was grabbed by her chest which would have been a d-cup at normal size and at this size you really weren't sure. She slowly crawls forward on clawed hands and feet and you just sit there unable to move. You stare up at her and you're caught in her gaze, you stare at her giant red eyes and you can't look away as they looked so beautiful in the firelight, you had to admit even though she was huge the mightyena in front of you was absolutely beautiful.

"Might....mighty.....MIghtyena" you stammer.

"Don't be afraid, I won't hurt you, but you'll probably want to leave like all the rest so i'll take you out of the forest tomorrow" she says looking down sadly "don't know why I keep getting people lost since they all want to leave" she mutters but you hear it.

"You're the one that got me lost" you yell.

"Yes, it gets really lonely in the forest because all the other pokemon avoid me, so my only real company are the occaisonal human adventurer that I get lost" she says shedding a few tears.

"Hey are you ok?" you ask.

"I'm fine" she says "now just go to sleep and treat this like a dream, you'll be out of the forest in the morning" she says laying down and curling up. You continue to hear sniffling noises come from her and now that the initial shock was over you weren't really scared or angry at her. You walk up and touch her back "Um....I can still hear you and it's kind of keeping me up" you say.

"Oh, well then i'll be quiet" she says. You walk around her and sit right in front of her "that's alright, if it's ok with you i'd like to talk" you say. She stares at you in disbelief "why? I got you lost and i'm a freak pokemon, not only am I an anthro but i'm so huge that no one wants me" she says.

"You're not a freak, you're beautiful" you say.

"What?" she asks.

"You're the most beautiful mightyena i've ever seen" you say realizing it after the shock wore off.

"You...you mean it?" she asks.

"Yeah, you take such good care of yourself you're hair and fur just sparkle, and you're eyes are well there's no word for them other then beautiful" you say. She uncurls herself and stares at you, "why aren't you afraid of me?" she asks.

"I was, when I first saw you, but you can't be that bad. You were the one that saved me when I fell off that cliff weren't you?" you ask.

"Well yes but you weren't supposed to know that" she says.

"You also watched over me while I was knocked out and you could have harmed or killed me at anytime but you didn't so that says you're a nice pokemon" you say smiling. She gently hugs you against her "thank you, that's the kindest thing anyone has ever said to me" she says.

"So what's you're name?" you ask her.

"I'm Alice" she says.

"Pleasure to meet you, i'm Matt" you say.

"Well Matt you've made me a very happy girl, do you know what you get for that?" Emma asks leaning over.

"I hope it's something good" you say. She snuggles you into her chest so you were surrounded completely.

"You get the best sleeping spot in the whole forest" Alice says "don't worry you'll still wake up outside the forest" she says.

"May I make a request?" you ask.

"It's the first time anyone's asked, so sure" Alice replies.

"Can you come with me?" you ask.

"What?" she replies.

"I want you to be my pokemon" you say, "you said yourself you're lonely here and well I think i've kind of fallen for you, so why not?" you ask.

"Never in the 17 years since my mom left me has anyone asked me to be their pokemon" Alice says sniffling. You knew Mightyena left their cubs when they were a year old so you figured she was around 18.

"Well then I hope you say yes, it's about time I got my first pokemon" you say.

"What? shouldn't you already have one?" Alice asks.

"I missed the ceremony, 18 years of age and not a pokemon to my name" you say smiling. "So will you?" you ask

She pauses for a second, "of course I will" she says rubbing her cheek against you. You give her cheek a hug as she gently squeezes you. "Thank you" she says giving you a kiss.

"Why are you thanking me?" you ask.

"I never knew I could be so happy before" Alice says hugging you into her chest.

"Well i'm glad you're happy, meeting you was worth the days of being lost" you say.

"So what should I call you? master? trainer?" she asks.

"Just call me Matt" you say.

"Alright Matt" Alice says.

"So as you're trainer is there anything I should know about you, other then the whole size thing" you say.

"I love being petted more then anything else, I like having my ears scratched, and I have mostly become a vegetarian but I still need meat every so often" Alice says. You file that last piece of info away as being very important.

"Well do you mind if I give you a pet, you know for watching over me and stuff" you say.

"Is that an order? from trainer to pokemon?" she asks smiling.

"Yes, yes it is" you say smiling. Alice lays out and you climb onto her stomach, you start rubbing and you see a look of pure happiness spread over her face. It takes you around an hour to pet her whole stomach but you smiled the whole time. Her fur was so soft and silky you just wanted to curl yourself up in it and never leave. You finished you're petting and Alice gently picks you up, "that felt so good" Alice says smiling at you.

"Glad you enjoyed it" you say. She gently hugs you into her chest and curls up "it's about time both pokemon and trainer got to sleep" Alice says and you can feel the happiness in her voice.

"Well then goodnight Alice" you say.

"Goodnight Matt" Alice replies giving you a little squeeze.
