You fall into Alice's palm and she doesn't even react, you walk up her arm and climb next to her ear.

"Hey Alice, wake up my sleepy mightyena" you say smiling at how fast you got used to her.

"Is that an order?" she mumbles in her sleep.

"Of course, now get up already I want to see those beautiful eyes of yours" you say. Alice gently moves from side to side until you see her eyes start to flutter. She slowly lifts her head and looks down at you, a smile crosses her face and she hugs you. "It wasn't a dream" she says happily.

"No it wasn't" you reply. She lifts you up to her nose and waits expectantly.

"What?" you ask.

"Where's my good morning kiss?" Alice asks.

"What?" you ask.

"Fine if you won't give me one i'll give you one" she says leaning over and gently kissing you.

"Fine fine" you say standing up and kissing the tip of her nose causing her to giggle.

"Oooh i'm just so happy that you were'nt a dream" Alice says cuddling you against her cheek.

"Yeah, we should probably go now, how long does it take you to get out of the forest?" you ask.

"It's a 5 minute walk for me from here" Alice says placing you down on her shoulder and starts walking.

"This is gonna be really weird to explain when I get back" you say. You remember what she said about meat before "oh yeah um...how often do you need to eat meat and how do you get it?" you ask.

"Only about once a month, and I scavenge off dead animals" Alice says.

"Ok well I think we might be able to replace the meat part of you're diet, problem is i'm not sure if anthro pokemon like pokefood" you say.

"What's that?" Alice asks. You take a bar of pokemon food you brought out of you're pocket, you unwrap it and she opens her mouth and you throw it in. She swallows the bar whole and smiles "that was good" she says.

"Good, then we can replace meat with pokemon food, it's a lot cheaper and a lot less....messy" you say.

"I can still have some meat right?" Alice asks.

"Sure, but it'll be kind of rare" you say. You see her ears droop a bit, "i'll try to get you as much meat as I can" you say. Her ears spring back up and you actually feel a skip in her step. You soon reach the edge of the forest "where do we go from here?" Alice asks picking you up and holding you in her hand.

You point at a house in the distance "that's my house" you say. Alice starts walking and it takes her less then a minute to reach you're house. She places you down a few meters in front of the house and you're suprised you're whole family wasn't alerted by Alice's footfalls. You run inside and find you're mother and father sitting opposite you're twin brother and they're all dressed in black. They don't even look up until you speak "why's everyone looking so glum?" you ask. They turn and just stare at you for a bit before you get a group hug "we thought you were dead after you didn't come out of that forest" you're mother says.

"I'm fine, i'm fine, although my new pokemon did help me out" you say.

"You finally got a pokemon that's wonderful, so where is it?" you're father says.

"Well she's an anthro so she's not in a pokeball" you say as you're father examines you're belt. "She's waiting just outside" you say.

"Well then have her come in" you're father says.

"That's kind of hard to do" you say.

"Oh so she's one of the larger ones, okay we'll come outside" you're father says. You walk out the door and you can't see Alice, you look around for her and you can't see her, all you can see is a few weird looking hills covered in black and gray grass. You smile as you're mother asks "so where is she, all I can see is that weird bunch of hills."

"Alice you mind standing up, so my family can meet you" you yell. You laugh out loud as you're whole family stands shocked as Alice sits up, you walk over to her and say "this is Alice the mightyena, she saved my life yesterday in that forest and agreed to be my pokemon."

"Hi" Alice says giving a little wave.

"Wow....you sure know how to pick a first pokemon" you're father says. He walks up to you and pulls you aside "i'm glad you got a first pokemon, but how are we supposed to feed that thing, and aren't they carnivores" he whispers.

"She likes pokefood" you whisper back "I threw her a pokefood bar back when we were in the forest and she hasn't objected for a while, I want to try something" you reply. You run into the house and grab a bag of pokemon food, you fill up a large bowl with about what you feed you're families mightyena and you run outside carrying it. Alice spots you and sniffs "is that food?" she asks.

"Yeah so open up" you say. Alice opens her mouth and much to you're families shock you jump onto her tongue and drop the whole bowl on before jumping off. She swallows the food and to you're amazment she falls sideways. "Alice you alright?" you ask.

"Ooh, that's more then i've eaten in a long time, i'm totally stuffed" she says. You smile as you're hypothesis was proven true, "hey Alice you said before that you scavenged meat off dead animals? what kind?" you ask.

"Small rodents like squirrels and rabbits" she replies.

"That explains it, this is gonna sound weird but Alice you're body somehow only requires the food requirements of a normal sized mightyena" you say. "Which means no giant food prices" you say.

"So Ms.Alice where will you sleep?" you're father asks.

"Well can't she just sleep out in the field?" you ask.

"Well sure, but how are you going to make sure she doesn't get in trouble?" you're mother asks.

"Simple, I sleep with her" you say. You're mother stands there shocked "you can't do that, she might hurt you, and it'll be cold" she objects.

"No offense mom, but I kinda already slept with her last night and it was nice and warm" you say smiling. You're twin walks up and pats you on the shoulder "well i'm glad you finally got a pokemon bro, but what are you gonna do with her?" he asks.

"I don't know, I don't want to turn her into a sideshow, we could always take on the gym leaders and the pokemon league that'll keep us in the money for a while" you say. You're twin pulls a cell phone out of his pocket. types in a number and has a quick conversation. He smiles and a minute later a limousine rolls up, a man in a buisness suit walks out of the car and stops dead in his tracks when he sees Alice, he runs over to you're twin and shakes his hand.

"I didn't believe it's true but it is" the man says. He turns to you "I'm Matt Sliph, owner of Sliph Co. and I want to offer you and that Mightyena of yours jobs" he says.

"I don't know" you say.

"All you're Mightyena will be is our spokesgirl, heck i'll even throw in a house for her" Matt says.

"What do you mean, for her?" you ask.

"I will build her a house, it might take a while but it'll happen" Matt says, you knew how powerful Sliph corp was as they developed the majority of pokeball technology.

"Well I don't know, hey Alice how do you feel about this?" you ask.

"Will it let me be together with you, just you and me?" she asks. You turn to the man and he nods "yeah" you reply. "Well then i'm all for it" she says. You turn to Matt and he has his hand out, you take his outstretched hand, "you'll make sure there are no ads trying to take advantage of Alice or turn her into a monster right?" you ask him.

"Of course, this is a once in a lifetime opprotunity and as a buisnessman I will make sure my whole power goes to maintaining a clean image for you're pokemon" he says. He gets into the car and it drives away.

"Well now that that's settled, what are you gonna do?" you ask you're twin.

"I guess get back to work, it is a normal work day after all" he says, he turns to Alice "hey by any chance do you have any siblings?" Alice shakes her head, "ah well you win some, you lose some, and then you hit the jackpot" he says punching you in the shoulder. You're twin walks over to a car and gets in before driving away.

"Well I guess until the house is built we'll be staying with you" you say turning to you're parents.

"Alright, but I better not hear anything weird coming from her" you're mom says staring at Alice.

"I won't do anything weird" Alice says her tail wagging a bit.

"Well, atleast until this house is built welcome home Alice" you say smiling. She picks you up and cuddles you against her cheek and you cna't help but smile.
15433222222112211.title: You both leave the forest

154332222221122112.content:
You can't believe what had happened over the past few months, Alice had become an instant celebrity once the original commercial aired. It began with a shot of you staring her down and she dives toward you, you back flip and throw a new heavy version of an anthro ball at her and it captures her. You smile as you pick the ball up and place it on you're belt before the name of the ball and the Sliph company logo comes on. As soon as people figured out you were the one in the commercials which suprisingly took a month, you're house was swarmed by people. As the months passed both you're and Alice's popularity skyrocketed, you even got a mini-series on tv that consisted of you chasing her around the globe trying to catch her, the final episode consisted of a loose adaptation of how you 2 met. By the time a year had passed you both had apparently quadrupled Sliph Co's sales and were the 2 biggest celebrities in the world (no pun intended). You wake up on the morning Mr.Sliph said that Alice's house was supposed to be finished and you sit up and you're surrounded by darkness. Alice had to start curling up around you since there was so much paparazi around, it got really annoying but you weren't complaining as it let you be close to her. You smiled to yourself the first time you "sicced" her on the paparazzi, "oh man never have I seen so many grown men piss themselves" you think laughing inwardly. You move around and scratch Alice under her chin, she moves her paws subconciously and you're able to get out. "Ahhh start of another day, finally that house is done maybe we can get some damn privacy now" you think.

You climb onto Alice's head and scratch her ears for a bit "come on sleepy, time to get up" you whisper into her ear.

"Mmmm 5 more minutes, and more pets" she mumbles back.

"Fine, geez I spoil you" you say scratching her ears. Thankfully the paparazzi had lessened in the last week as you weren't sure how much more you could take, you're blinded for a second by a flash bulb. "Oh son of a bitch" you say hopping down, you quickly find the culprit a female reporter.

"Hand it over" you say sticking you're hand out. She reluctantly holds the camera out and you take out the memory card, "thank you" you say handing her a picture you had taken of you cuddled up with Alice late at night before walking back to Alice. Alice was sitting up now, woken up by the flashbulb, "sorry that you had to be woken up like that" you say walking up.

"No problem, as long as my little treat is alright" she says lowering her head and licking you're whole right side.

"Geez I thought you knew how to control you're licking" you say climbing up and stroking her chest.

"I do, but this ways more fun" she replies. "Master can you pet me?" she asks.

"Geez Alice you know I hate being called that, it's Matt" you say moving so she can lay down.

"I know but "oooh"" she slightly howls as you start petting "calling you master just sounds better" she says.

"It's Matt or no pets or scratches" you say sitting down. She picks you up and stares at you with those big doggy eyes and starts whining. "No, no matter how much you whine or beg it's Matt or nothing" you say smiling somewhat suprised that she still wanted to play this little game.

"Fine, Matt it is" she says putting you down on her back.

"Good, and you better not go back to using master tomorrow or else no pets and I mean it" you say. You smile to yourself as you rubbed and stroked her backside, it had become a near constant battle of wills, you'd always say I mean it and for a while those eyes and whining got you to concede but then you firmed up and she had to call you Matt to get you petting again.

"Master, are you comfy?" she asks turning and smiling at you. You lay back in her fur, "yeah i'm peachy" you say staring up at the sky. She reaches over and pulls you up her back, "come on get back to petting." You walk up to her and gently kiss her muzzle "stop calling me master and I will, geez, even though you're my big cuddly puppy you're still so disobedient" you say smiling.

"You're right i've been a naughty puppy so you need to punish me" she says licking you and you feel her behind wiggle.

You look backwards and smile, "nah I know of a better way" you say. You climb onto her head and do the one thing you knew she hated, you blew into her ears. She hated it becuase it tickled so much, instantly she started giggling and as you blew again she started squirming from side to side. "Are you going to be a good puppy from now on?" you ask nefore blowing again.

"Yes....yes Matt.. just please stop" she says between giggles and you stop blowing. She picks you up and smiles at you, "you're a very bad trainer, exploiting you're own pokemon's weakness" she says smiling.

"Oh yeah, what are you gonna do about it" you say and she starts licking you.

"Mmmm" she sighs as she licks you, she keeps it up for a minute before stopping and you wipe some of her saliva off. "There now we're even Matt" she says smiling nefore rubbing against you with one cheek.

"Alice can we stop this little back and forth, it's fun, but i'm not sure how many times the media's caught you licking me like this and tried to portray you as a monster" you say hugging her muzzle to show you didn't think she was.

"Fine, but you have to give me pets and scratches whenever I ask" she says.

"Deal, as long as you let me curl up with you whenever I ask, no more calling me Master it's Matt, and you always stay by my side" you say.

"Deal" she says before lowering her muzzle and kissing and you kiss the tip of her muzzle back. You lay back and snuggle up in her stomach fur, you could almost feel her smile but you could feel her tail start excitedly wagging back and forth. You gently start stroking her fur and she wraps her hands around you covering you in her warmth. You stroke harder rewarding her for being a good puppy like she always was and she gives you a little squeeze.

"Matt, are you glad we met?" Alice asks.

"Of course, I can't imagine my life without you Alice" you reply.

"That's good" she says running one hand down you're back. You smile and you feel no resistance as you stand up, "give me a sec i'll be right back" you say. You run towards the house and grab Alice's favorite treat, a whole steak. You come back out and Alice runs toward you and smiles down at you her tail wagging like crazy. She goes down on all fours and moves her head forward expectantly. "Open" you say and she opens her mouth, you throw the steak onto her tongue and she closes her mouth and slowly chews it savoring the taste.

"Ahhhh so good" she sighs before rolling over onto her back. You climb up between her breasts and lay down, you heard Alice's breathing slow a bit and you gently rubbed her chest. "Such a spoilt mightyena anthro you are, and I wouldn't trade you for the world, I love you Alice" you say finally getting the balls to say it..

A'ice much to you're suprise sits up and you fall into her lap, she wraps her hands around you and you're lifted up to her muzzle "I love you too Matt" she says kissing you and you kiss her back. You break the kiss when you hear a car, Mr, Sliph drives up and exits the car "sorry to interrupt you 2 but the house is done, Matt you ride with me, Alice if you'd be so kind you'll follow behind" he says. Alice nods and puts you down, you get into the car and the driver starts the engine. You drive for a good half hour, you heard Alice behind you the whole time ,you pass through the city and then you spend another hour getting to a large forest. You spend half an hour taking a specifically cut path and you enter a clearing that could hold a small city.

"This is the place" Mr.Sliph says stepping out, you step out and you see Alice's house is a.....
154332222221122112.title: Skip ahead a year to when Alice's house is ...

choices: Go with her, what's the fuss
1543322222211221121.content:
Alice's house seemed to be just a normal 2-story house from what you could see of it. Although it was made for Alice so it took up a large portion of the clearing. You didn't have much time to observe the outside as Alice had dropped down onto all 4s. She runs up behind you, scoops you up by the neck of you're shirt and runs through the door. Alice runs up the stairs with a purpose and she quickly identifies and heads to the bedroom. She runs inside and leaps from the floor onto the bed depositing you on the wool sheet before laying down herself. "man I wonder how many mareep had to get sheared to make this" you think. Alice pushes against you with her nose, "ok Ms. Excited what do you want?" you say turning around and facing her. Alice traps you under her palm, "hey get off" you say and she shakes her head.

"No can do, not until you agree to my demands" she says.

"Demands? since when do you have demands?" you ask although you were laughing. "Fine let's hear em" you say.

"Pet me" she says lifting her hand and rolling onto her back. You smile and climb onto Alice's stomach, you start rubbing her furry belly and she starts to sigh and you heard her tail start whacking against the bed. You pet Alice for a good 10 minutes before stopping, "why'd you stop" she says raising her head.

"You get a new house and the first thing you want is me to pet you" you say shaking you're head. "We need to explore a bit, I mean we'll be living here from now ow" you say.

"Exploring later, petting now" Alice says pinning you to her chest.

"Alice no, I order you to get up so we can explore the house" you say. Alice smiles at you, "no can do" she says.

"What i'm you're trainer" you say. Alice lifts you up and she's smiling, "Matt that order thing worked for a little while when we first met, no more" she says.

"Fine, how about we explore then I pet you" you say.

"Deal" Alice says standing up. You walk around the house and you find out the house has a master bath as well as the bedroom on the top floor, and on the main floor there was another bathroom, a quite sizeable kitchen and a very large living room. You smiled as Alice walked through the place, "wow, this must have taken a looonnnggg time to build" you say.

"Well i'm worth it aren't I?" Alice asks.

"Of course, i'm just trying to figure out how they made the tv" you say examining the comparative 52 inch plasma tv on the wall. Alice lays down on the couch and sighs, "well Matt back to petting" she says happily.

"What if I don't want to" you say, Alice turns her head and stares at you, "what if I want the equivelant of a pet?"

"Aww you feel left out is that it?" Alice says and you nod. You see a smile form on her face, "don't worry Matt i'm sure I can give you a good pet" she says. Alice picks you up and lays you down on her stomach, she then gently runs her fingers over you're back and you can't help but sigh. "Aww you like pets too don't you Matt" Alice says.

"Well i'd call this more of a rub" you say, Alice puts a bit more pressure and you sigh again "ok fine I like pets too" you say laying you're head down. You heard Alice giggle and she lays back, "well this isn't so bad, it's actually fun taking care of you too" she says.

"Glad you enjoy it" you say grabbing one of her fingers to tell her to stop, "so my beautiful mightyena shall I go back to petting you?" you ask standing up.

"You sweet talker" she says knocking you over with 1 finger then stopping to think.

"I don't sweet talk, I tell the truth" you say a wide grin on you're face.

"I'm fine without pets for a bit" Alice says, she pulls you up her body and smiles down at you, "is there anything you need?" she asks.

You laugh "i'm fine, thanks for asking though" you say. "So I guess since you don't take orders anymore, our little game is done?" you say.

"Game? what game?" Alice asks feigning ignorance.

"Oh come off it, you know where you call me master and I threaten to take you're pets away" you say.

"Oh yes that's right, I still have to repay you for that don't I" she says grinning. Alice lifts you up and holds you in place seeming to think. "Oh I know the perfect repayment" she says, she lays out over the couch and puts you down on her butt.

"Alice I am not petting that" you say pointing to her butt.

"Aww why not?" she asks.

"There are some places you just don't get near, that's one of them" you say.

"Are you saying my butt isn't cute?" Alice asks.

"What? no of course it's cute but....wait a minute" you say. You felt Alice start shaking, soon she was laughing her tail off and you had to jump onto the remaining couch space to keep from falling off her.

"I can't "haha" believe that "haha" you said that" Alice says laughing.

"Yeah yeah laugh it up" you say, "you do have a cute butt though" you comment. Alice stops laughing and stares at you, "really?" she asks.

"Yeah, but then again to me every part of you is either cute, beautiful, sexy, or a combination of the 3" you say sitting down. Alice looks at you and smiles "aww thanks Matt" she says nuzzling you.

"No problem Alice, anything for my special mightyena" you say hugging her nose. Alice lifts her head up leaving you dangling, "uh Alice can you lower you're head" you say.

"Nah, I think i'll just keep you like this for a bit, in fact" she doesn't finish instead you feel you're tongue lick you're sides.

"Hey, don't i'm ticklish" you say, you felt Alice's tongue lick faster as you said you were ticklish. "Alice "haha" stop "haha" I give" you say. Alice doesn't stop, she licks you even faster, you can feel you're grip starting to loosen and you finally lose you're hold, you don't even fall as Alice had her palm right under you. "Don't do that" you say looking up at her.

"Why not?" Alice asks looking innocent.

"You scared me, I trust you but I do not trust that couch" you say. Alice looks down at you and holds you about her, "oh how much do you trust me?" she asks.

"I've stuck with you this far, so with my life" you say.

"Thanks Matt" she says cuddling just above her chest. "Just for that, you get to sleep in here tonight" she says dropping you right in letting her chest catch you as you fall. You look up at her "so if I didn't say that I wouldn't get to sleep with you?" you ask.

"Well no, of course you'd still get to sleep with me, but" Alice doesn't answer she stops trying to think of something to say but can't.

You laugh, "it's okay Alice, I know what you mean" you say. Alice much to you're suprise lays forward instead of backwards surrounding you with her chest and just giving you some room to breathe.

"Hey get off me" you say.

"No, I don't wanna" Alice says.

"Geez, how did I end up with such a disobedient mightyena" you say.

"Oh so i'm disobedient am I" Alice says lowering her head and licking you.

"Bad dog, no stop "haha" you start laughing as Alice licks you and she had a huge smile on her face. She lets you out after a minute and you lay back into her stomach, "geez Naughty dog" you say.

"Maybe you should train me more" Alice says.

"Nah, you're perfect as a somewhat naughty puppy" you say absent-mindedly stroking her stomach.

"Thanks Matt" she says. You get up and walk to her face, you climb up and stare at her face to face, "hey Alice I just realized something" you say.

"What?" she asks.

"You haven't taken a bath since we first met, so guess what time it is" you say smiling.

"Nooooo I don't wanna take a bath" she says giving you those puppy dog eyes.

"Nuh uh that's not gonna work, now up you go" you say. Alice reluctantly gets up "fine but you have to come with me" she says.

"What? you can easily bathe yourself" you say.

"No if I'm having a bath, you're joining me" Alice says.
1543322222211221121.title: normal 2 story house

15433222222112211212.content:
You sighed, "fine Alice whatever i'll come, but you do really need a bath" you say. Alice nods and stands up, she carries you in her palm upstairs into the bathroom and puts you down on the counter before she starts running a bath. Thankfully as you looked around Sliph Co. had supplied all the products you needed to take care of Alice so there was a giant bottle of shampoo and other things like a brush and comb both about as big as you were. The tub was soon filled with water although it looked more like an olympic swimming pool to you. Alice turns and smiles at you "well come on strip already" she says.

"I said i'd come with you not i'd get into the water" you say. In response Alice picks you up and drops you into the water, you obviously swim up and glare at her "that is totally unfair" you say as she pulls you out.

"Yeah, yeah, now lose the clothes" she says putting you down on a towel. You stripped out of the wet clothes and Alice picked you up and and sat in the tub before putting you down in the water, she then flipped over and sighed. "Ahh the water's so warm" she says, "mmm" you reply, you climb onto the side and coat yourself hands in the shampoo liquid, "Alice dunk yourself" you say and she does. You jump onto her back almost slipping off in the process and start rubbing the shampoo into her fur. It soon creates a lather and you start pretty much massaging her causing her to sigh. She starts to submerge herself "hey hey, I need you to stay up" you say and she pushes herself back up. It took you around 20 minutes to shampoo her hair, neck, back, and legs as well as give her paws a rub. By the end you were beat and just floated in the water. Alice turned over and slid under you coming up so you were lying on her chest, "thanks Matt, I’ve never had someone pay so much attention to me" she says.

"You’re welcome Alice, your worth it" you reply. She snuggles you into her wet fur and you sighed, thankfully you were squeaky clean as there were a few times you fell while washing Alice. She sat up and moved you onto the towel before draining the bath, she quickly towelled herself off and you got to work brushing and combing her. It wasn't hard, it wasn't like there were a lot of knots in her fur, it just took a while and was tiring. By the time you were done another 20 minutes had gone by. although Alice's fur was now silky smooth, fluffy, and practically shined in the light which brought a smile to your lips. Your clothes by were dry so you got dressed and promptly collapsed on the towel, "aww are you tired from taking care of little ol me?" Alice asks.

"Little my butt, but yeah I actually am beat" you reply. Alice picks you up and nuzzles you, "thank you Matt, you take such good care of me" she says.

"Well you’re my pokemon and I love ya" you reply patting her cheek. You just laid in her palm and she walked to the bedroom and sat down. She started to pet your back and you sighed, she lays back on the bed and curls up so she was surrounding you. You felt her continue petting your back and you petted her stomach to sort of return the favour. Alice sighs, "I’m so glad I met you Matt, everyday is fun, I’m not hungry, lonely, and I’m always comfortable" she says.

"I'm really glad I met you too Alice, everyday I get to wake up to your cute smile, those beautiful eyes, and your cheery personality" you reply. Alice gives you a squeeze and giggles "thanks Matt" she says and you were both startled up as you heard a doorbell. Alice sits up and picks you up laying you down on her shoulder, she walks through the hall and down to the door and opens it. She looks around and you look down and see Matt standing there, you tap Alice and she looks down. She bends down and smiles at him "hello sir" she says happily.

"Hi, how are my 2 best workers doing? You gotten used to the house yet?" he asks.

"Yeah we have actually, thanks sir" you reply. He nods and walks up "so do you 2 know about the commercial we're supposed to shoot in an hour?" he asks.

"Uh, no" you reply looking at Alice and she shrugs almost knocking you off. Matt smiles "well then i'm here to pick you up, now come on" he says. Alice puts you down and you follow him to his car, he lets you in first and then gets in. Alice taps on the top of the car once your in "actually have a reason to chase this car" she says jokingly. You stick your head out and smile at her, "yeah yeah, it's not like you'll have to work hard to follow" you reply. Matt pulls you back in and the car's started. Alice followed the car dilligently, the commercial film site seemed to be in the city as that was where the car was going. It was pretty funny at the 2 red lights the car had to stop at as Alice followed right behind the car so you heard the comments such as "mommy look it's a giant puppy." The car headed to the industrial sector of the city and stopped in front of a warehouse, Matt left the car and you followed him into the building as well as Alice although she had to pretty much crawl to get through the door. You tapped Matt on the shoulder "so uh what kind of commercial is it this time, can't be another pokeball commercial can it?" you ask.

"Of course not, you 2 are so famous that you are 2 of the most recognizable faces in the whole world, heck some of the legendaries are less known then you 2" he says. You laughed "that can't be true" you say. "Ok it's not, but you 2 are still really big, so we thought you should have some products of your own" Matt says.

"So, what's the product?" you ask. Matt grabs what looked like a sleeping bag but it had the colors of a mightyena and seemed to be covered in fur, "uh...it's a sleeping bag" you say.

"No, no it's called the Mightyena's hug, it's supposed to be like what you do every night" he says.

"What I do every night?" you ask.

"You know, sleep with Alice curled up around you, people find that really cute, so we thought they might like to try it themselves" Matt says.

"This isn't real fur is it?"Alice asks sounding quite peeved.

"Of course not, it's actually made out of mareep wool we just dyed it and spread it out to make it look like fur" Matt says. Alice glares at him and he looks at her "look Sliph is known for it's good treatment of pokemon, we'd never hurt a mightyena just to make a product" he says. Alice nods, "so uh how's this commercial work?" you ask.

"Well you just need to get into it and then we'll have Alice wrap around you and you'll say I can't tell the difference" Matt says. You climb into the thing but you could easily tell the difference, it just felt weird and no way near as comforting as Alice was when she wrapped around you. "Matt i'm not sure if I can say that, there is a difference, Alice is a million times better, nothing can make me as comfy or feel as safe as her surrounding me" you say getting out of the "hug". Matt sighs and looks at you, "I knew you were gonna say that, can you still say it, I mean no one else knows how wonderful Alice's hugs are" he continues. You look up at Alice, "you ok with that, it just well feels like i'm lying, no I am lying" you say looking at Matt. He sighs and Alice pushes against you "you should do it, I mean i'd much rather have people just buy a mightyena and sleep with it near them, but we're not things so if this is the closest they can get, it's ok" Alice says. You nod and the commercial went well although your acting was a bit forced. Afterwords Alice gave you a hug and you just sat there together for a bit which was a bit awkward for everyone else.
15433222222112211212.title: Go with her, what's the fuss

choices: You only slept for an hour
You both wake up and it's the middle of the night
154332222221122112121.content:
You heard a cough and looked down at Matt, "not to break up the love-fest between you 2 but do you want to have lunch?" he asks.

You look up at Alice and she smiles down at you "it's your choice" she says.

You stopped and thought about it for a few seconds and looked down at Matt "sorry but I think we'll have to decline. I mean if we went out with you there'd be tons of paprazzi, we'll just have lunch at home" you reply. Matt sighs but nods and Alice puts you down so she can crawl out of the warehouse. You walk out of the warehouse and she picks you up and puts you down on her shoulder and starts walking back. People thankfully gave her a wide berth, parents held back children that wanted to run up and pet her, and really everyone just kept their distance which was good for you. Alice just barely fit the streets though so she still had to be careful, it took you a bit longer to get home as like before Alice stopped at red lights, even though she was easily the biggest piece of traffic on the road. Finally you reached home without incident which was always a good thing and Alice pushed the door open, walked inside and sat down on the couch.

One hand reached up and you jumped down onto it and she lowered you into her lap, "hey Matt, how did that sleeping bag feel?" she asks.

"Nowhere close to as good as your hugs" you reply, Alice lifted you up and gently hugged you in response.

"So does that mean you lied?" she asks.

"Yes" you reply holding your head down a bit and you got a light lick in response.

"It's alright, I am one of a kind after all" Alice says. You nodded and sat back in her hand just content to sit.

Finally Alice spoke up "weren't we supposed to have lunch?" she asks.

"Yeah" you reply, she stands up and walks over into the kitchen, placing you down on the table.

"What do you want?" she asks.

"Whatever your hungry for, I really don't mind" you reply. Alice sighs and starts rooting around the fridge, she finally pulls out 2 steaks which she held between 2 fingers, you still couldn't believe that all she needed to eat was what a normal mightyena might eat. "I still can't believe that's all you need to eat, you don't sneak snacks when I'm not looking are you?" you ask.

"Never" she replies sounding almost offended "a girl has to watch what she eats, this figure doesn't just take care of it self" Alice says.

"Oh yeah and a few grams of fat totally affect a girl who weighs more then a ton" you reply.

"How do you know that?" Alice says sounding almost shocked.

"Alice, to put it bluntly you are a very.....tall Mightyena, your as big as most skyscrapers" you say. Alice looks at you for a second and sits down, just reaching over to transfer the steaks to a giant frying pan which always sat on the stove and flick it on.

"Matt, do you think I'm fat?" she asks.

"What? No your not fat, I mean sure you weigh more then any other girl, but that's due to your size, and I love every inch of you from the tips of your ears to the soles of your paws" you say.

This brought a smile onto Alice's muzzle and she reached over and moved you closer to her, "what was that? I didn't hear you correctly" she says.

You smile slightly "I said, I love you from the tops of your cute ears to the very soles of your wonderful paws" you say. This time a giant smile spreads from ear to ear on Alice's face and she leans over and kisses you gently. You just let her kiss you until a smell reaches your nose, you sniff and quickly look over to the stove, "um...Alice, the steaks" you say.

"Oh my gosh" she says, she reaches over spearing the steaks on a claw and shutting off the stove, she quickly transfers them to a plate and holds her hand and whimpers.

"Burn yourself?" you ask, she nods and you can't help but smile. Alice gets up and holds her hand under cold water like your supposed to do when you burn yourself, then she sits down and holds it out for you, mainly the finger with the claw she used to spear the steaks. You slowly walk up and lift her finger up and kiss the tip, making sure that you don't spear yourself on her claw. Alice giggles "thank you Matt" she says, you smile up at her "no problem" you reply. Alice moved your steak off the plate and handed it you while she picked up her own, the 2 of you dug into the steaks and both were devoured in less than a minute.

Alice picked up the plate and took all of 5 seconds to clean it before putting it away, she lowers a hand and you climb on, Alice moves over to the couch and just lays out "hey Matt, what do you think it would be like if we never became famous?" she asks.

"Well we'd probably have a few more problems" you say.

"Oh really? Like what" Alice asks.

"Well, no offense but just managing your um....extras, would be a real problem" you say.

Alice nods "well then it's a good thing we became famous then" she says.

"Yeah, I'd need a pooper scooper bigger then I am otherwise" you say. Alice seems to get an image of that in her mind as she giggles and lifts you up placing you down on her stomach. Without needing to be told you started to pet her stomach and you got a soft contented sigh from Alice as a response. You decided to just lay out on her stomach since that was more comfortable then sitting and you didn't need to bend over to pet her that way. Her fur was as fluffy and comfy as ever and her low growls and contented sighs served as calming background noise. It was very hard but you somehow managed to keep yourself from falling asleep, After what felt like 10 minutes you sat up and looked over at Alice, you could tell she was asleep from the slow steady breathing and the fact that her chest and you rose and fell at a very rythmic pace. Sighing since you didn't have much else to do you stood up and moved over to the top of the couch. You just sat there and watched as Alice slept, she was quite cute and you just sat there for almost half an hour as she slept.

She slowly and groggily got up after that half hour and seeming to not feel you she started to look around frantically "hey Alice, I'm over here" you say. She turns her head and you were scooped up and hugged to her cheek "don't do that, you really scared me" she says. You gently stroked her cheek "what was there to be afraid of" you say.

"I, I thought you'd left me" she says her voice cracking for a second. You hug her cheek and softly coo as you speak "Alice I'd never leave you, your my lovely Mightyena, I'll leave you the same time I cut off my own arm" you say. You were moved to in front of her and you got a tongue licking and then a quite long kiss from Alice. She laid back on the couch a large smile on her face as she hugged you to her. "I'm going to have another nap, and this time your not going anywhere" she says. You sigh making it seem like it was a big deal but just simply got comfy in her grasp. Alice's grip tightened slightly around you and the two of you fell asleep for a not exactly well-deserved but very comfy and restful nap.
154332222221122112121.title: Head back home

154332222222.content: Typhlosion she's a hot choice
154332222222.title: still more

1543322222221.content:
"Damn old man" you mutter to yourself as you walk through the caves. "Give him $100 for some information for a good place for a trainer to catch his first pokemon and he sends me to these damn caves," you say. The place was not a very comfortable cave system, every stalactite dripped water as well as there were tons of zubat. They were everwhere; in the tops of the caves, flying around. Some of the zubat were anthros and a few even came up and talked to you, but well they were zubats and nobody likes zubats simply because of how annoying they were. You walked deeper and deeper into the caves until a zubat anthro came down and landed in front of you.

"Hi" she says.

"Hi" you reply walking past her. She flies up beside you "so whatcha doing here?" she asks.

"Looking for pokemon" you reply.

"New trainer?" she asks.

"No, just never got my first and technicalities have stopped me from getting it so i've gotta catch my first" you reply.

"Ever thought about a zubat?" she asks.

"No offense but nearly everyone and their mother has atleast one zubat, the only more caught pokemon is rattata" you reply.

"So then what are you doing here?" she asks again.

"Old man told me there was a pretty rare pokemon here, even if it's something like a rhyhorn it'd be a pretty good first" you say still walking.

"Hmmm I think I might know what he's talking about" the zubat anthro says.

"Really? you mind showing me?" you reply.

"Sure, but ya gotta catch me first" she says flying around you in circles.

"No offense but I thought pokemon didn't want to be caught" you reply.

"Yeah well I do" she says flying right up into you're face and you tap a ball on her head. It drops to the ground and moves for a bit before giving off an audible ping. You pick it up and let the zubat girl out, "ok now show me this pokemon" you say.

"You have to name me first" she says swaying from side to side.

"Fine, how about Brianna" you say.

"That sounds perfect" she says smiling, "just follow me and i'll show you the pokemon" she says taking off. You follow her deeper and deeper into the cave, you walk for 10, 20, 30, minutes before you start hearing a low rumbling sound. "What the hell is that?" you ask Brianna.

"Nothing, it just means we're getting closer and closer" she says still flying. You walk behind her till you both enter a huge section of the cave. The ceiling had to be 2000ft high and there was an equally large pathway going off on the other side. Laying against one side of the wall was a pokemon, you couldn't really tell what kind it was as you looked at it's front but when it turned over and you saw it's blue and red back you instantly recognized it as a typhlosion.

"Oh my god that's perfect" you yell and the pokemon stirs and wakes up, it turns to look at you and you are soon staring at a very agitated looking female
1543322222221.title: Sure

15433222222211.content:
"So human why have you woken me?" the typhlosion says. You don't answer for a few seconds at she was absolutely gorgeous, there was a mane of orange and yellow hair that looked like a fire on the back of her hair with wavy blue locks on the sides. Her chest had to be a pair of F-cups but that didn't detract from her figure. Her body was a little larger but you could tell if was all muscle under the fur of her stomach and legs as her arms were quite slim. Her most beautiful feature was her face as it went up into a cute set of ears and a really cute muzzle. You snap yourself out of the daze you were in as you hear her growl "I...I came here to catch some pokemon" you say.

"Oh?" the typhlosion says "well I haven't had a challenger in a while this might be a bit fun" she says standing up and you truly see just how tall she is.

"I...don't think that's possible, all I have is this zubat" you say indicating Brianna "and well one of you're flamethrowers would fry her to a crisp" you say.

"Good point, tell you what, you said you're looking for pokemon right" she says.

"Yeah, well how about you take me on, win and you get me as a pokemon" she says.

"What if I lose?" you ask.

"Well you'll either die or become my servant as recompense for disturbing me" she says.

"Is there anyway I can just you know leave and never see you again?" you say.

"No" she replies.

"Fine, what's the challenge" you say.

"You pick" she says.

"Fine a mental challenge, you give me a riddle to solve, and if I do, I ask you one, this continues until one of us can't answer" you say.

"Fair enough, what has 4 legs in the morning, 2 in the afternoon, and 3 at night?" the typhlosion asks.

"Simple, human beings" you reply.

"Alright what's the beginning of every death and the end of every world?" you ask.

"Hmmm...." she stands there and thinks for a minute and then sighs.

"I concede human, you win" she says.

"Good, the answer's the letter d" you say smiling. You see the flames on her back flare up and she drops onto all fours and stares at you "you tricked me" she says.

"That's what a riddle contest is" you say trying to stand you're ground. She stares at you for a few more seconds before the flames subside and she sighs, "fine throw one of those orbs you humans carry and catch me" she says.

"I can't" you say walking up with Brianna next to you.

"What?" she asks.

"No ball made for anthromorphic pokemon was made for one of you're size" you say sitting in front of her.

"Oh, well then there's no obligation to uphold my side of the bargain" she says.

"None except you're honor" you say as she stares at you. "You have a name?" you ask.

"Cynthia" she replies.

"Cute, it fits you" you reply.

"So human aren't you scared of me" Cynthia asks.

"A bit, but then again i've spent 18 years without a pokemon and now i've got 2 so i'm pretty happy and i'm not letting a little fear stop me" you reply.

"So do we just call you trainer?" Brianna asks.

"Just Matt is fine" you say reaching forward and stopping just over Cynthia's muzzle.

"Why are you hesitating?" Cynthia asks.

"Well i'm not sure if it's ok to pet you" you say.

"I am you're pokemon so it's alright" Cynthia says in a soothing voice. You gently rub the soft fur on her muzzle and she stares up at you with her cute eyes, "aren't you worried about my size?" Cynthia asks.

"Nah, I think the more of you to love the better" you say smiling. "You two both look great" you say giving Brianna a once over. She was pretty small in the chest area but her slim figure and long sexy legs made up for it, that and the fact she had wings on her back not those arm-wing things some anthro pokeon ended up with. "So Cynthia how do you eat, you know at you're size?" you ask.

"Oh, I don't require anymore food then a normal typhlosion I just exploded to this size one year" she says. You can't help but glance at Cynthia's chest every so often and she finally catches you "hmmmm do you want to come closer, maybe snuggle up?" she asks parting her chest and staring at you, a cute smile on her muzzle.

"No……I couldn't....I mean we just met and all" you say.

"Oh come now, we both know you want to, besides it's not like I mind" Cynthia says. You're pushed forward by Brianna who dives forward after you. You land in Cynthia's chest and as you turn over Brianna lands on you. "See now isn't this comfy" Cynthia says engulfing the two of you in her breasts and holding them together with one arm.

"mmmm I like being this close to you Matt" Brianna says snuggling against you.

"What...what's gotten into you 2" you say.

"All we female pokemon want is to be loved" Cynthia says squeezing her chest together a bit.

"That's fine, but isn't this a bit much" you say trying to wiggle out but Brianna holds you in place while Cynthia gently pushes you back down.

"Matt it's alright, we may have just met, but I like you already" Cynthia says.

"Oh yeah prove it" you say and within she had picked you up and kissed you before blowing a small heart shaped flamethrower into the air. "Happy now?" she says.

"Yeah" you reply and she snuggles you back in. Brianna wraps herself around you and Cynthia falls asleep trapping you both in her chest, considering you couldn't move you opted to just go to sleep as well. You open you're eyes to see Cynthia smiling down at you, much to you're suprise she leans down and licks you're whole body. Even more suprising was the fact that it felt like you were surrounded by a large wet waterbottle not the burning heat you expected. She smiles as she lifts her head and you feel Brianna hug herself into you're side. "morning" she mumbles still clinging to you're side.

"How do you know it's morning, we're in a giant cave" you say.

"Look up" Cynthia says and you're just able to see a pinprick of light come from the top of the cave.

"So what are we doing today Matt?" Cynthia asks.

"I really don't know, I mean I want to show you 2 off but there's the whole size problem, I mean me and Brianna are able to use the area between you're chest as a bed and it could still fit a good few people" you say.

"I swear i'll be really careful" Cynthia says.

"Fine, but you move when I tell you to and stop instantly on cue, can you do that?" you say.

"Of course" Cynthia replies. You put Brianna back into her ball and Cynthia gently stands up transferring you to one of her palms. She walks out the cave through the other more her sized entrance and you find yourself on the whole other side of the cave system. "The city I live in is in that direction" you say pointing right behind her.

"Alright well then it's kind of the long way, should take us 10 minutes" Cynthia says happily. She walks through the forest and much to you're suprise what you though were tracks created by huge machines were actually created by Cynthia walking through the forest. She walked very carefully as not to disturb the pokemon in the forest too much. As she promised you reached the other side of the cave in 10 minutes and you let Brianna out of her pokeball.

"Can you go scout ahead?" you ask and she nods before flying off. Brianna comes back in a few minutes, there's a crowd of people waiting outside the forest limits all looking somewhat scared and with their pokemon out.
15433222222211.title: 1000ft tall anthro typhlosion

choices: You're approached by a man with an offer
154332222222111.content:
"Cynthia can you put me down?" you ask. She nods and places you on the ground, You ran ahead and it took you a minute to reach the clearing where the whole town was waiting. A man with about 6 different pokemon runs up and pulls you towards him "come on kid there''s something over there" he says. You pull back, "chill it's just my pokemon" you say, the man stares at you for a second and begins to laugh, "you've gotta be kidding me, a pokemon would have to be like a thousand feet tall to make that much noise" he says.

"Cynthia, come here" you yell. Everyone freezes as the ground starts to shake a bit and you can hear a tree or 2 crashing to the ground, "note to self tell her to watch her step, like a lot" you think. The man who grabbed you stands there in shock as it takes only a few seconds for Cynthia to walk up, she bends over and pokes you're back, "you called" she says.

"Just wanted everyone to meet you" you say walking up and petting her muzzle as Brianna lands beside you. Turning around you say, "everyone i'd like you to meet my second pokemon Cynthia, Brianna the Zubat to my right is my first" you say.

It was eerily quiet until someone asks, "she doesn't eat meat right?"

"I think she did, but we can just substitue it with pokefood, and no before anyone says it she doesn't eat people" you say. Brinna gave off a small whimper behind you, "they actually think i'd eat them?" she whispers to you.

"I really hope not but i'm just telling them if they do" you reply rubbing her cheek to get her to calm down. The man from before steps forward, "she's harmless right?" he asks.

"Go up and pet her and see for yourself" you reply stopping to think for a second, "but be sure to ask her if it's ok. Cynthia by now was lying out on her stomach with her feet gently pressing against 2 trees. The man slowly walks up, "um...can I pet you?" he asks probably not used to asking. Cynthia nods and moves onto her side which suprised you, the man walks up and slowly starts petting her stomach, Cynthia sighed and fully rolled over onto her back thankfully without damaging anything. The man continued rubbing her side, and she started sighing, you climbed up onto her stomach and just sat there, "anyone else who wants to pet her can, but be sure to ask first" you say. Soon the whole town was petting some part of Cynthia except her chest and nether regions. Brianna flew up beside you and by now Cynthia was pretty much purring if you could call it that, Brianna grabbed you're arm and hugged you, "hey since Cynthia's getting all the attention can you pet my head?" she asks. You nodded and started to pet her head, Brianna sighed and snuggled close, "i'm so glad you caught me" she says. "Me too" you reply, you get up after a few minutes, "ok that's enough" you say and thankfully everyone seemed to have gotten used to Cynthia in these few minutes and stopped backing up. You walked across her body to her face, "hey Cynthia you ok?" you ask. She didn't respond she was in complete bliss as she had pretty much just gotten a fully body massage but every part happened at the same time. Finally she's able to lift her head, "i'm...i'm ok" she says.

"Geez maybe I should just let the whole town take care of you, you really seemed to be enjoying that" you say sitting down. You were thrown backwards and you landed in her lap as she quickly sat up, she looked down at you sternly, "what...what'd I say" you ask sitting up. Cynthia stares down at you for a bit before picking you up, before you knew what was happening she had opened her mouth and thrown you in, you landed on her tongue and she shut her mouth. You froze in fear and her tongue wrapped around you and started rolling you around...almost like she was tasting you or acquiring you're scent, you were suprised as it not only felt like you were rolling but also that Cynthia was rolling around. She opened her mouth after about 5 seconds and you fell out onto the ground, she looked down at you and you turned to her.

"What the hell was that?" you yell at her, she moves her head forward and looks at you, "master" she says before gently rubbing against you. You were confused for a second till the smell hit you, you smelt like slightly charred wood, "I have claimed you as my own just as you have claimed me as you're own" Cynthia says. Brianna flies up, "hey what about me" she says, thankfully everyone was just watching.

"So did you just mark me?" you ask.

"Yep, believe me that was a lot more pleasent then the alternative" Cynthia says, you were startled as Brianna grabs you and bites you're neck before letting go, "there now you have my bite mark" she says.

"Owww.... thanks I guess" you say. Everyone was now staring at the 3 of you, "they're all crazy let's get em" someone yells. Cynthia growls and stands up, but you step in front of her, "look all I want to do is be able to take my pokemon home and live in peace, is that ok?" you ask. There was muttering through the group before the village elder, a spindly old man with white hair walks up to you. He looks up at Cynthia and Brianna, "how long have you 3 known each other?" he asks.

"Less than a day, maybe a day" you reply.

Directing the next question at Brianna and Cynthia, "do you 2 trust this man?" he asks. They both nod and Cynthia gives you a quick lick for reassurance.

"Well then I see no problem, although Matt why don't you take the old Miller estate, there's plenty of room and easily enough room for Cynthia" he says.

"But..but I thought we were saving that for someone who deserved it" you say.

"Oh and the person who's able to tame a 1000ft typhlosion isn't special?" he asks.

"I didn't tame her, I beat her at a riddle contest, with the riddle you taught me" you reply.

The elder chuckles, "good I was wondering if someone would finally find use for that old riddle, never the less the estate is yours, although we'll be expecting you're help with a few projects" he says smiling a bit.

"As long as it doesn't hurt or degrade my pokemon you have a deal" you say. The elder nodded, "welcome to the village you 2 this kid's kind of stupid but he's got a big heart he'll take care of you well" he says to Brianna and Cynthia.

"Hey, i'm really not sure if that's a compliment or an insult" you say.

"Both" the elder replies chuckling before hobbling away. Cynthia gently picks you up and rubs you against her cheek, "sorry for ya know having to stick you in my mouth thing" she says.

"If the alternative was what I think it was, apology accepted" you reply. The group parts to let you through and you guide Cynthia to the miller estate with Brianna happily following. The old miller Estate was huge with about 5 acres of land surrounding it and a quite nice 2 story house in the center. It wasn't anything extravegant but it had 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a living, kitchen and even a porch. You had always wished to live there as a kid as you imagined just riding on the back of a rapidash over the property. Cynthia walks to the back of the property and lays down in the grass, "ahh now this is a nice place, although what do I do if it rains?" she asks.

"I don't know, I mean couldn't you just like flamethrower the clouds away or something?" you ask jokingly.

"Nah this place needs rain, oh well i'll just let my fur burn and it'll turn the rain to steam" Cynthia says.
154332222222111.title: Go ahead to warn them

1543322222221111.content:
You just laid around for a bit, Brianna wanted to have you fly with her, by which she meant carry you around while she flew but you had to decline since well you honestly weren't sure how her small wings could lift her up yet alone both of you. Suddenly you hear the sound of screeching tires and you run around to the front of the house with Brianna in tow while Cynthia just sits up and looks over the house. You were surprised at what you saw sitting on the road outside the house, there was what looked to be a trailer truck like the ones that carry the produce to stores as well as a limo. Out of the limo steps a very short man with a gigantic bald spot in the center of his head and he was wearing a business suit.

The man walks right up to you and shakes your hand "pleasure to meet you, I am Zacharius Sliph and I heard you own a very.....unique typhlosion" he says.

"Cynthia there's a man here to see you" you shout, She just stands up and steps over the house her paw landing right behind you. Mr. Sliph just looked up shocked "wow there really is a typhlosion that big" he says the look on his face almost making you fall over in fits of laughter. Mr. Sliph composes himself and walks over to the truck and lifts up the back and this time it was you was left gaping. Every inch of the van was filled with dollar bills "they're all 100s, i'd prove it but it's kind of hard to move them" he says. You were left entirely speechless, Mr. Sliph walks up and smiles "i'm glad my offer seems to be going over so well, so do we have a deal, you'll trade me that typhlosion and I'll give you the money, think of what you can buy with it" he says smiling.

You weren't sure what to do, every one of your dreams could probably be fulfilled with all that money.....except having Cynthia by your side. You look Mr. Sliph in the eye and say "no deal sir, Cynthia's worth more to me then all the money in the world." Mr. Sliph glares at you angrily then sighs "son you really seem to love that pokemon so I won't force your hand, although if you ever need a job come find me" he says before getting into the limo and it and the truck drive off. You were pulled backwards and warm fur covered flesh surrounded you as well as something warm and wet pressed against your back. Cynthia happily cuddled you in her chest and she licked your back for a good minute before stopping.

"Ooh Matt thank you, thank you, you are the nicest trainer ever" she say pushing you further and further into her cleavage.

"I couldn't just abandon you now could I, what kind of trainer would that make me" you reply petting the wall surrounding you. Cynthia licks you again and turns over hugging her chest so it compacted around you sealing you inside.

"I'm never letting you go Matt, not now, not ever" she says happily rolling from side to side.

"Hey what about me" Brianna says fluttering over the 2 of you. Cynthia opens her arms for a second and Brianna dive bombs in so she's face to to face with you before the walls of flesh close around the both of you. "Hehe if I didn't know that we were laying in Cynthia's chest this would be pretty romantic" Brianna says moving up and gently kissing you. You slowly returned the kiss and the walls moved a bit so you could move your arms and wrap them around her. You weren't sure why Cynthia was letting you do this but you weren't going to complain. You gently move the hair out of Brianna eyes and you can finally see them, she had beautiful purple eyes that stared into yours lovingly and she kissed harder and harder. You felt her tongue enter your mouth and start to explore. It was strange as you honestly expected an iron taste as she was a bat but you didn't really taste anything. Finally after a minute the kiss broke and Brianna just snuggles her head into your shoulder. Even though this was the second time in 2 days you did this you felt asleep like that with Cynthia's and Brianna's bodies wrapped around you, there was just no greater feeling of warmth and security then what those 2 gave you.

You woke up slowly, somehow you as well as Brianna and Cynthia had slept through the rest of the evening as well as the night, thankfully it didn't rain as the three of you were asleep. You slowly removed yourself from Brianna's hug and you smiled as she whispered "I love you master" and laid her head down where yours had been. It took a bit of doing but you were finally able to pull yourself out of the fleshy prison Cynthia had created. You looked at her sleeping face and you couldn't help but smile, even though she took up the whole front yard she still looked cute and honestly kind of vulnerable while sleeping. You walked up over her body and stood on tip toes near one of her ears. "Cynthia, come on sexy get up" you whisper. Cynthia gently stirs, you hoped it would wake Brianna up as well as you knew if she woke up first you'd probably be stuck in Cynthia's cleavage for a whole week as Brianna wouldn't want to let go of you. 1543322222222222223332.content: As a gardener looking for a job, you need a piece of land untamed by man to have your new home away from civilization and be with the wild pokemon. Throughout your travels, this is where your opportunity comes out to surprise you to meet more than just an ordinary honey gatherer from the Tropics of Alola
1543322222222222223332.title: Ribombee

15433222222222222233321.content:
After picking a map from the Alolan owners of the Pokepelago, you make the trip to the less traveled route of the islands that has been unlatched by human knowledge further north. These owners tell rumors of what happened to past travelers where they never come back after their first trip. Not believing on their credibility, you pursue this new piece of farmland for you to call home and be connected to nature. Though you may be no trainer, you have hopes of meeting your first partner pokemon one day. Opening your GPS through your phone, you set the map and set

As you guide your boat to this northern current many pokepelago owners had been avoiding, thick whit fog surrounds your boat. "My. This fog, can't see so well." Checking on the sail, a medium gust of wind blows your boat further north. Amidst the fear of being stuck on the ocean surface, there is this unexplained tension and anticipation on where you will be brought. Looking at the sea, you see illuminating lights most likely coming from the antenna of the chinchou. Uncertain if these things could be friendly or not, you take a moment to pray for safety. With a breath of hope, you guide the sail following the chinchous sailing you in various current pathways.10 minutes past, the fog quickly disappears and the skies open with a bit of clouds on the sky. Finally, you come across an island with two hills and a mountain on a medium island. "Whoa. What the ... where am I?"

As the winds continue to bring your boat to the shore, the tropical breeze and the scent of the trees hits your nose easing out the stress you obtained from the sailing. Upon getting down from the boat ad landing on the sandy beach, a giant shadow covers your view of the sky. Lo and behold, you find yourself under the presence of a Ribombee gliding down next to you. Unlike the few Ribombees you saw at Ula-Ula Island, this ribombee you see is 9 times bigger in height and possibly 12 times heavier, "bbbeee. Hello. Hello young human..."
15433222222222222233321.title: Go make some honey with her

154332222222222222333212.content:
"What is a young human like you sailing your way here?" the big ribombee's size give the appearance of being 4 feet taller than the tallest Unovian basketbal player.

"I ... uhh ... I am looking for a new place to build my farm house. Being with nature as much as I could. City life has been ... tiring." though you only brought survival and construction items along with a guideline book on how to build green with the couple amount of electronic parts and gadgets packed on your boat.

"You know what I just had this morning? A sense of renewal coming from your emotions. I'm normally repulsive of wandering human visitors. But ... you seem to end up being lead by chinchou. I'll have a word with them later. But you are a visitor. Welcome to my home young man." as the giant honey bee sings out a call, a swarm of cutieflies and ribombees couple with a small group of female ledians gather around you and the giant bug pokemon. Seeing their presence gives you the thought that you are talking with the alpha of this hive. "Help out this young man on finding a place or him to rest. Give him berries too."

Obeying their queen, you see the ledans carrying the technical equipment whereas the other bugs go on carrying your other things. "Well, where would my resting place be?"
154332222222222222333212.title: A 25 year old young man

choices: Rest in the house and fix it

1543322222222222223332122.content:
"I have a house made for guests. You know what, you get to have me escorting you." With the giantess queen fluttering increasing her size while following behind you, the shadow she creates gives you a good amount of wind to feel the tropical breeze. Upon arriving at a field of flowers, you spot a set of wooden trees holding a wood crafted house. "Oooohh. How did you all build something .... like this?"

"You are not the only human that visited my place. The last one came around a few decades ago before turning a new leaf in another life. So, my buggy residents polished the house and even tried living in it in a human-like way." looking at the large square gardening pots, there are ledybas and ledians watering it with miniature wooden cups filled with water. Inside, you spot two heracross playing a board game of some sort. Everywhere you see are tiny groups of cutieflies and ribombees flying around the place. Then there are the few Butterfrees and Pelippers just above the sky and in the distance flying for who knows how far from the island. "Feel free to stay here and rest. But if you want, feel free to follow me." even though he turns around to see the queen grow much bigger to that of a 2 story floor house, you have other things to mind.

Unknown to the human, tens to hundreds of male pokemon are already in the middle of fertilizing the millions of eggs inside the queen's ovaries. For her, she can already sense the last former human visitor turned to her kind already having an orgasm for ten of her eggs.
